 29219                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29220 00004C09 41                      	inc	cx
 29221 00004C0A 41                      	inc	cx
 29222 00004C0B B020                    	MOV	AL,' '
 29223 00004C0D F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 29224                                  	;MOV	AX,SS
 29225                                  	;MOV	DS,AX
 29226                                  	; 27/06/2024
 29227 00004C0F 16                      	push	ss
 29228 00004C10 1F                      	pop	ds
 29229                                  	;call	DEVNAME
 29230                                  	;retn
 29231                                  	; 18/12/2022
 29232 00004C11 E9C501                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 29233                                  
 29234                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 29235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29236                                  ;
 29237                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 29238                                  ;
 29239                                  ; Inputs:
 29240                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 29241                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 29242                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 29243                                  ; Function:
 29244                                  ;	Search from root for path
 29245                                  ; Outputs:
 29246                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 29247                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 29248                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 29249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29250                                  
 29251                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29252                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29253                                  
 29254                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29255                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8C9Dh
 29256                                  
 29257                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:7F82h)
 29258                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:829Eh)
 29259                                  
 29260                                  ROOTPATH:
 29261 00004C14 E879FD                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 29262                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29263 00004C17 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah
 29264                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 29265 00004C19 3824                    	cmp	[si],ah ; 0
 29266 00004C1B 7507                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 29267                                  
 29268                                  	;;;
 29269                                  	;; 15/02/2024
 29270                                  	; Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:82A6h
 29271                                  	;mov	word [CURBUF],0FFFFh
 29272                                  	;;;
 29273                                  
 29274                                  ; Root dir specified
 29275 00004C1D A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 29276 00004C20 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 29277                                  	; 24/09/2023
 29278                                  	;XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 29279                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 29280 00004C23 C3                      	retn
 29281                                  
 29282                                  ; Inputs:
 29283                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 29284                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 29285                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 29286                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 29287                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 29288                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 29289                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 29290                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 29291                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 29292                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 29293                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 29294                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 29295                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 29296                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 29297                                  ; Function:
 29298                                  ;	Parse path name
 29299                                  ; Outputs:
 29300                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 29301                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 29302                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 29303                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 29304                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 29305                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 29306                                  ;	   Zero set
 29307                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 29308                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 29309                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 29310                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 29311                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 29312                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 29313                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 29314                                  ;	   Zero reset
 29315                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 29316                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 29317                                  ;	ELSE
 29318                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 29319                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 29320                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 29321                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 29322                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 29323                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 29324                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 29325                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 29326                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 29327                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 29328                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 29329                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 29330                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 29331                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 29332                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 29333                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 29334                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 29335                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 29336                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 29337                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 29338                                  
 29339                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 29340                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 29341                                  
 29342                                  	; 15/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29343                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:8CAEh
 29344                                  
 29345                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 29346                                  FINDPATH:
 29347 00004C24 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 29348 00004C25 56                      	PUSH	SI
 29349 00004C26 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 29350 00004C28 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 29351 00004C2C 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 29352 00004C31 7415                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 29353 00004C33 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 29354 00004C37 750F                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 29355 00004C39 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 29356                                  	;;;
 29357                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29358 00004C3D A1[DC0A]                	mov	ax,[DIRSTART_HW]
 29359                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax
 29360 00004C40 2689454B                	mov	[es:di+curdir.ID+2],ax
 29361                                  	;;;
 29362                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 29363 00004C44 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory cluster
 29364                                  NOIDS:
 29365                                  
 29366                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 29367                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 29368                                  ;
 29369                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 29370                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 29371                                  ;
 29372                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 29373                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 29374                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 29375                                  
 29376                                  	;MOV	AX,SS
 29377                                  	;MOV	ES,AX
 29378                                  	; 15/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 29379 00004C48 16                      	push	ss
 29380 00004C49 07                      	pop	es
 29381                                  
 29382                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 29383 00004C4A BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 29384 00004C4D B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 29385 00004C50 AA                      	STOSB
 29386 00004C51 AB                      	STOSW
 29387 00004C52 AB                      	STOSW
 29388 00004C53 AB                      	STOSW
 29389 00004C54 AB                      	STOSW
 29390 00004C55 AB                      	STOSW
 29391                                  
 29392                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 29393 00004C56 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 29394 00004C59 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 29395                                  GetNam:
 29396                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29397                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 29398                                  
 29399                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 29400                                  	; 16/12/2022
 29401                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !
 29402                                  	
 29403 00004C5B AC                      	LODSB
 29404 00004C5C 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 29405 00004C5E 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 29406 00004C60 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29407 00004C62 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29408 00004C64 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 29409 00004C66 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29410 00004C68 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 29411 00004C6A 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 29412 00004C6C 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 29413                                  StoNam: 
 29414 00004C6F AA                      	STOSB
 29415 00004C70 EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 29416                                  _SetExt:
 29417 00004C72 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 29418                                  GetExt:
 29419 00004C75 AC                      	LODSB
 29420 00004C76 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29421 00004C78 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29422 00004C7A 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 29423 00004C7C 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 29424 00004C7E 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 29425 00004C80 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 29426 00004C82 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 29427                                  StoExt: 
 29428 00004C85 AA                      	STOSB
 29429 00004C86 EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 29430                                  _GetDone:
 29431 00004C88 4E                      	DEC	SI
 29432 00004C89 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 29433 00004C8B 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 29434 00004C8E 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 29435 00004C8F 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29436 00004C90 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 29437 00004C92 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 29438 00004C94 E9ED00                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 29439                                  check_device:
 29440 00004C97 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 29441                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 29442                                  	; 15/02/2024
 29443 00004C98 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 29444                                  	; 23/09/2023
 29445                                  	;cmp	byte [si],0
 29446 00004C9A 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 29447                                  
 29448                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 29449                                  
 29450 00004C9C 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 29451 00004CA0 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 29452                                  
 29453                                  NOT_LAST:
 29454                                  
 29455                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 29456                                  
 29457 00004CA4 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 29458                                  
 29459                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 29460                                  	;context ES
 29461 00004CA5 16                      	push	ss
 29462 00004CA6 07                      	pop	es
 29463 00004CA7 E82F01                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 29464 00004CAA 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 29465 00004CAB 7208                    	JC	short FindFile		; Not a device
 29466 00004CAD 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; Test next char again
 29467                                  	;JZ	short GO_BDEV
 29468                                  	;JMP	FILEINPATH		; Device name in middle of path
 29469                                  	; 27/06/2024
 29470 00004CAF 752D                    	jnz	short FILEINPATH_j
 29471                                  
 29472                                  GO_BDEV:
 29473 00004CB1 5E                      	POP	SI			; Points to NUL at end of path
 29474 00004CB2 E985FE                  	JMP	Build_devJ
 29475                                  
 29476                                  FindFile:

 29714                                  ;
 29715                                  ; Inputs:

 29753                                  	;and	al,16h

 29755                                  ;
 29756                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 29757                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not

 29775                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>

 29784                                  ; Function:

 29786                                  ; Outputs:

 29867                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 29868                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29869                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 29870                                  ;
 29871                                  ; Inputs:
 29872                                  ;	[NAME1] has name

 29874                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 29875                                  ; Function:
 29876                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 29877                                  ; Outputs:

 29941                                  ;Break	<ValidateCDS - given a CDS, validate the media and the current directory>
 29942                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29943                                  ;
 29944                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 29945                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 29946                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 29947                                  ;
 29948                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisCDS points to CDS of interest

 30142                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 30143                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30144                                  ;
 30145                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 30146                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 30147                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 30148                                  ;
 30149                                  ;	[path]device
 30150                                  ;
 30151                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 30152                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 30153                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 30154                                  ;
 30155                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 30156                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 30157                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 30158                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 30159                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 30160                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 30161                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 30162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30163                                  
 30164                                  CheckThisDevice:
 30165 00004F32 57                      	push	di
 30166 00004F33 56                      	push	si
 30167 00004F34 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 30168                                  
 30169                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 30170                                  
 30171 00004F36 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 30172 00004F38 E8B40E                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 30173 00004F3B 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 30174 00004F3D 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 30175                                  
 30176                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 30177                                  
 30178 00004F3E AD                      	LODSW
 30179 00004F3F 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 30180 00004F42 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 30181                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 30182 00004F45 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 30183 00004F47 AC                      	LODSB
 30184 00004F48 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 30185 00004F4A 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 30186 00004F4C 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 30187 00004F4E AC                      	LODSB
 30188 00004F4F E89D0E                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 30189 00004F52 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 30190                                  
 30191                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 30192                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 30193                                  
 30194                                  ParseDev:
 30195 00004F54 1E                      	push	ds
 30196 00004F55 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 30197 00004F56 E8DA0D                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 30198 00004F59 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 30199 00004F5C F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 30200 00004F5D 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 30201                                  
 30202                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 30203 00004F5F 16                      	push	ss
 30204 00004F60 1F                      	pop	ds
 30205                                  
 30206                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 30207                                  ;
 30208                                  ; SR;
 30209                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 30210                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 30211                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 30212                                  
 30213 00004F61 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 30214 00004F64 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 30215                                  
 30216                                  ; M026 - end
 30217                                  
 30218 00004F67 E86FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 30219                                  
 30220                                  SkipSearch:
 30221 00004F6A 5E                      	pop	si
 30222 00004F6B 1F                      	pop	ds
 30223                                  
 30224                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 30225                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 30226                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 30227                                  
 30228                                  CheckReturn:
 30229 00004F6C 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 30230 00004F6D 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 30231 00004F6F 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 30232                                  Check_Done:
 30233 00004F71 5F                      	pop	di
 30234 00004F72 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 30235 00004F73 C3                      	retn
 30236                                  NotDevice:
 30237 00004F74 F9                      	STC
 30238 00004F75 EBF5                    	JMP	short CheckReturn

 30614                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 30615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30616                                  ;
 30617                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 30618                                  ;
 30619                                  ; Inputs:
 30620                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 30621                                  ;	AH is function code
 30622                                  ;		= 0 Input
 30623                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 30624                                  ;		= 2 Output
 30625                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 30626                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 30627                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 30628                                  ;				   present.
 30629                                  ;	AL = character if output
 30630                                  ; Function:
 30631                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 30632                                  ; Outputs:
 30633                                  ;	AL is character if input
 30634                                  ;	If a status call
 30635                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 30636                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 30637                                  ; For regular files:
 30638                                  ;	Input Status
 30639                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 30640                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 30641                                  ;	Input
 30642                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 30643                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 30644                                  ;	Output Status
 30645                                  ;		Always ready
 30646                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 30647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30648                                  
 30649                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 30650                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 30651                                  
 30652                                  ; 21/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 30653                                  ; DOSCODE:9175h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 30959                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 30960                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but

 31318 00005351 B108                    	MOV	CL,DEVWRT ; mov cl,8
 31319 00005353 36020E[FF02]            	ADD	CL,[SS:VERFLG]		; SS override
 31320 00005358 EBC6                    	JMP	SHORT SETCALLHEAD
 31321                                  
 31322                                  ; 22/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 31323                                  %if 0	; SC
 31324                                  
 31325                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31326                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31327                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31328                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31329                                  
 31330                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 31331                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31332                                  ;
 31333                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 31334                                  ;
 31335                                  ; Inputs:
 31336                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 31337                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 31338                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 31339                                  ; Function:
 31340                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 31341                                  ; Output:
 31342                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 31343                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 31344                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 31345                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 31346                                  ;
 31347                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31348                                  
 31349                                  RW_SC:
 31350                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 31351                                  	
 31352                                  	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 31353                                  	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31354                                  	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 31355                                  	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 31356                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31357                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31358                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 31359                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31360                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 31361                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31362                                  
 31363                                  	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 31364                                  	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 31365                                  	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 31366                                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 31367                                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 31368                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 31369                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 31370                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31371                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 31372                                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 31373                                  	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.
 31374                                  	MOV	word [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STDON ;AN000;LB. fake done and ok
 31375                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31376                                  	JMP	short saveseq 		    ;AN000;LB. save seq. sector #
 31377                                  readSC: 				    ;AN000;
 31378                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]   	    ;AN000;LB. subtract sector num from
 31379                                  	MOV	CX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. saved sequential sector
 31380                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR]    	    ;AN000;LB. number
 31381                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2]  	    ;AN000;LB.
 31382                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31383                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;LB. greater than 64K
 31384                                  	JNZ	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. yes,save seq. sector #
 31385                                  chklow: 						
 31386                                  	CMP	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. <= 1
 31387                                  	JA	short saveseq2		    ;AN000;LB. no, not sequential
 31388                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],-1	    ;AN000;LB. presume all SC valid
 31389                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;LB. yes, sequential
 31390                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLSCNT],AX	    ;AN000;LB. read continuous sectors
 31391                                  readsr:
 31392                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD+2]	    ;AN000;LB. save buffer addr
 31393                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. in temp vars
 31394                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLXAD]	    	    ;AN000;LB.
 31395                                  	MOV	[ss:TEMP_VAR],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31396                                  
 31397                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. use SC cache addr as
 31398                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;LB. transfer addr
 31399                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31400                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31401                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],1	    ;AN000;LB. flag it for later;
 31402                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;LB. current drive
 31403                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_DRIVE],AL	    ;AN000;LB. set current drive
 31404                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. current sector
 31405                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR],AX	    ;AN000;LB. set current sector
 31406                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31407                                  	MOV	[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31408                                  saveseq2:				    ;AN000;
 31409                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31410                                  saveseq:				    ;AN000;	
 31411                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;LB. save current sector #
 31412                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR+2],AX	    ;AN000;LB. for access mode ref.
 31413                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31414                                  	MOV	[ss:SEQ_SECTOR],AX 	    ;AN000;LB.	
 31415                                  	JMP	short scexit 		    ;AN000;LB.	
 31416                                  scexit2:				    ;AN000;LB.
 31417                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB.	clear carry
 31418                                  scexit: 				    ;AN000;		
 31419                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31420                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;LB. restore registers
 31421                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 31422                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;LB.
 31423                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31424                                  	POP	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31425                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31426                                  
 31427                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>
 31428                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31429                                  ;
 31430                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 31431                                  ;
 31432                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31433                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31434                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31435                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31436                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31437                                  ; Function:
 31438                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 31439                                  ; Output:
 31440                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 31441                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 31442                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 31443                                  ;
 31444                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31445                                  
 31446                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31447                                  IN_SC:
 31448                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31449                                  	MOV	AL,[ss:SC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. current drive
 31450                                  	CMP	AL,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	    ;AN000;;LB. same as SC drive
 31451                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31452                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	    ;AN000;;LB. subtract sector num from
 31453                                  	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector
 31454                                  	SUB	CX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]        ;AN000;;LB. number
 31455                                  	SBB	AX,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]      ;AN000;;LB.
 31456                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31457                                  	;CMP	AX,0			    ;AN000;;LB. greater than 64K
 31458                                  	JNZ	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31459                                  	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 31460                                  	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31461                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. clear carry
 31462                                  	;JMP	short inexit		    ;AN000;;LB. in SC
 31463                                  	; 16/12/2022
 31464                                  	retn	; 30/04/2019
 31465                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 31466                                  	;jmp	short inexit
 31467                                  
 31468                                  outrange2:				    ;AN000;;LB. set carry
 31469                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31470                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31471                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31472                                  
 31473                                  ;Break	<INVALIDATE_SC - invalide secondary cache>
 31474                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31475                                  ;
 31476                                  ; Procedure Name : Invalidate_Sc
 31477                                  ;
 31478                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 31479                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 31480                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 31481                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 31482                                  ;	   [SC_STATUS]= SC status word
 31483                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 31484                                  ;
 31485                                  ; Function:
 31486                                  ;	invalidate secondary cache if in there
 31487                                  ; Output:
 31488                                  ;	[SC_STATUS] is updated
 31489                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31490                                  
 31491                                  INVALIDATE_SC:
 31492                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31493                                  
 31494                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;;LB. in secondary cache
 31495                                  	JC	short outrange		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31496                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate the sector
 31497                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;;LB. in the secondary cache
 31498                                  	NOT	AX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31499                                  	AND	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;;LB. save the status
 31500                                  outrange:				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31501                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31502                                  
 31503                                  ; DOSCODE:87A5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31504                                  ; 22/11/2022
 31505                                  ; DOSCODE:876Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31506                                  
 31507                                  ;Break	<VIRREAD- virtually read data into buffer>
 31508                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31509                                  ;
 31510                                  ; Procedure Name : SC_FLAG
 31511                                  ;
 31512                                  ; Inputs:  SC_FLAG = 0, no sectors were read into SC
 31513                                  ;		     1, continuous sectors were read into SC
 31514                                  ; Function:
 31515                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31516                                  ; Output:
 31517                                  ;	 carry clear, data is moved to buffer
 31518                                  ;	 carry set, bad sector or exceeds maximum sector
 31519                                  ;	   SC_FLAG =0
 31520                                  ;	   CALLSCNT=1
 31521                                  ;	   SC_STATUS= -1 if succeeded
 31522                                  ;     
 31523                                  ;		       0 if failed
 31524                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31525                                  
 31526                                  VIRREAD:
 31527                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31528                                  
 31529                                  	CMP	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. from SC fill
 31530                                  	JZ	short sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. no
 31531                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]	    ;AN000;;LB. restore buffer addr
 31532                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD+2],AX	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31533                                  	MOV	AX,[ss:TEMP_VAR]	    ;AN000;;LB.
 31534                                  	MOV	[ss:CALLXAD],AX		    ;AN000;;LB.
 31535                                  	MOV	byte [ss:SC_FLAG],0	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sc_flag
 31536                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. one sector transferred
 31537                                  
 31538                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT],STERR ;AN000;;LB. error?
 31539                                  	test	byte [ss:DEVCALL_REQSTAT+1],(STERR>>8) ; 80h
 31540                                  	JNZ	short scerror 		    ;AN000;;LB. yes
 31541                                  	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31542                                  	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31543                                  	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31544                                  	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31545                                  	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31546                                  	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31547                                  	XOR	CX,CX			    ;AN000;;LB. we want first sector in SC
 31548                                  	CALL	SC2BUF2 		    ;AN000;;LB. move data from SC to buf
 31549                                  	POP	CX
 31550                                  	POP	DX			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31551                                  	POP	DI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31552                                  	POP	ES			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31553                                  	POP	SI			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31554                                  	POP	DS			    ;AN000;;LB.
 31555                                  	JMP	SHORT sc2end		    ;AN000;;LB. return
 31556                                  scerror:				    ;AN000;
 31557                                  	MOV	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;;LB. reset sector count to 1
 31558                                  	MOV	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate all SC sectors
 31559                                  	MOV	byte [ss:CurSC_DRIVE],-1    ;AN000;;LB. invalidate drive
 31560                                  	STC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry set
 31561                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31562                                  sc2end: 				    ;AN000;
 31563                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;;LB. carry clear
 31564                                  	retn				    ;AN000;;LB.
 31565                                  
 31566                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro  DOS v4.0
 31567                                  ; DOSCODE:87FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31568                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31569                                  ; DOSCODE:87C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 31570                                  
 31571                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>
 31572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ;
 31574                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 31575                                  ;
 31576                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 31577                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 31578                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 31579                                  ; Function:
 31580                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer
 31581                                  ; Output:
 31582                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved
 31583                                  ;	   carry set, not in SC and data is not moved
 31584                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31585                                  
 31586                                  SC2BUF:
 31587                                  	; SS override for all variables used
 31588                                  	CALL	IN_SC			    ;AN000;LB. in secondary cache
 31589                                  	;JC	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31590                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31591                                  	jc	short sexit
 31592                                  	MOV	AX,1			    ;AN000;LB. check if valid sector
 31593                                  	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 31594                                  	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 31595                                  	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid
 31596                                  ;entry SC2BUF2
 31597                                  SC2BUF2:				    ;AN000;
 31598                                  	;MOV	AX,CX			    ;AN000;LB. times index with
 31599                                  	;MUL	word [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]    ;AN000;LB. sector size
 31600                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31601                                  	mov	ax,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31602                                  	xchg	ax,cx ; cx = [ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]
 31603                                  	mul	cx
 31604                                  	ADD	AX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR]	    ;AN000;LB. add SC starting addr
 31605                                  	ADC	DX,[ss:SC_CACHE_PTR+2]	    ;AN000;LB.
 31606                                  	MOV	DS,DX			    ;AN000;LB. DS:SI-> SC sector addr
 31607                                  	MOV	SI,AX			    ;AN000;LB.
 31608                                  	MOV	ES,[ss:CALLXAD+2]		    ;AN000;LB. ES:DI-> buffer addr
 31609                                  	MOV	DI,[ss:CALLXAD]		    ;AN000;LB.
 31610                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31611                                  	;MOV	CX,[ss:SC_SECTOR_SIZE]	    ;AN000;LB. count= sector size
 31612                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. may use DWORD move for 386
 31613                                  ;entry MOVWORDS
 31614                                  MOVWORDS:				    ;AN000;
 31615                                  	CMP	byte [ss:DDMOVE],0	    ;AN000;LB. 386 ?
 31616                                  	JZ	short nodd		    ;AN000;LB. no
 31617                                  	SHR	CX,1			    ;AN000;LB. words/2
 31618                                  	DB	66H			    ;AN000;LB. use double word move
 31619                                  nodd:
 31620                                  	REP	MOVSW			    ;AN000;LB. move to buffer
 31621                                  	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. clear carry
 31622                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB. exit
 31623                                  noSC:					    ;AN000;
 31624                                  	STC				    ;AN000;LB. set carry
 31625                                  sexit:					    ;AN000;
 31626                                  	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 31627                                  
 31628                                  %endif	; SC

 31660                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 31661                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31662                                  ;
 31663                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 31664                                  ;
 31665                                  ; Inputs:
 31666                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 31667                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 31668                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 31669                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 31670                                  ;               entries
 31671                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 31672                                  ; Function:
 31673                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 31674                                  ; Outputs:
 31675                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 31676                                  ;       ELSE
 31677                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 31678                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 31679                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 31680                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 31681                                  ;
 31682                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31683                                  
 31684                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31685                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31686                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 31687                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 31688

 31690                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.22, MSDOS.SYS)
 31691                                  
 31692                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 31696                                  
 31697                                  BUILDDIR:
 31698                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 31700                                  
 31701 0000535A A1[D805]                	MOV	AX,[ENTFREE]
 31702 0000535D 83F8FF                  	CMP	AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 31703                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 31704                                  	;CLC
 31705                                  	;retn

 31707 00005360 750E                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)

 31716 0000536E 7502                    	JNZ	short NEWDIR
 31717                                  	;STC				; Can't grow root
 31718                                  	; 24/09/2023
 31719                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 31720                                  builddir_cmc_retn:

 31723                                  builddir_retn:

 31733                                  	;;;

 31742 00005389 72E6                    	jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 31743                                  NULLDIR:

 31747 0000538B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 31749 00005391 41                      	inc	cx ; 1

 31752 00005395 72DA                    	jc	short builddir_retn

 31902                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 31903                                  ;
 31904                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.

 31906                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.

 31908                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry

 31954                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 31955                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31956                                  ;
 31957                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 31958                                  ;
 31959                                  ; Inputs:
 31960                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 31961                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 31962                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 31963                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 31964                                  ;
 31965                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 31966                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 31967                                  ;
 31968                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 31969                                  ;               terminated)
 31970                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 31971                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 31972                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 31973                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 31974                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 31975                                  ; Function:
 31976                                  ;       Make a new node
 31977                                  ; Outputs:
 31978                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 31979                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 31980                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 31981                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 31982                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 31983                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 31984                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 31985                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 31986                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 31987                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 31988                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 31989                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 31990                                  ;       ELSE
 31991                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 31992                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 31993                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 31994                                  ;               containing new node.
 31995                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 31996                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 31997                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 31998                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 31999                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 32000                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 32001                                  ;
 32002                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32003                                  
 32004                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32005                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 32006                                  
 32007                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32008                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32009                                  
 32010                                  ; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32011                                  ; DOSCODE:951Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32012                                  
 32013                                  MakeNode:
 32014                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 32015 00005460 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 32016 00005466 50                      	PUSH	AX 		; Save AH value
 32017 00005467 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 32018 0000546C A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 32019 0000546F E8ACF6                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 32020 00005472 88CA                    	MOV	DL,CL		; Save CL info
 32021                                  	;MOV	CX,AX		; Device ID to CH
 32022                                  	; 23/02/2024
 32023 00005474 91                      	xchg	ax,cx
 32024 00005475 58                      	POP	AX		; Get back AH
 32025 00005476 732D                    	JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 32026 00005478 7505                    	JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 32027 0000547A 80FA80                  	CMP	DL,80h		; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 32028 0000547D 7405                    	JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 32029                                  make_err_4:
 32030 0000547F B004                    	MOV	AL,4		; case 1 bad path
 32031                                  make_err_ret:
 32032                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 32033                                  	; 23/02/2024
 32034 00005481 98                      	cbw
 32035 00005482 F9                      	STC
 32036                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 32037 00005483 C3                      	retn
 32038                                  
 32039                                  	;entry	RENAME_MAKE	; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 32040                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 32041                                  make_type:
 32042                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 32043                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32044                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 32045 00005484 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 32046 00005489 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 32047 0000548B 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 32048                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 32049                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 32050 00005490 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 32051 00005495 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 32052 00005497 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 32053 00005498 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 32054                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32055                                  make_retn:
 32056                                  	;return
 32057 0000549B C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 32058                                  
 32059                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 32060                                  
 32061                                  make_type2:
 32062 0000549C C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32063 000054A0 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX		; nothing exists Disk Node
 32064 000054A2 F9                      	STC			; Not found
 32065 000054A3 EB59                    	JMP	short make_new
 32066                                  
 32067                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 32068                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 32069                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 32070                                  ;   else => file
 32071                                  
 32072                                  make_exists:
 32073 000054A5 7447                    	JZ	short make_exists_dir
 32074 000054A7 B003                    	MOV	AL,3		; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 32075                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 32076 000054A9 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 32077 000054AE 753A                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 32078                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 32079                                  				;  if making DIR or Volume ID
 32080 000054B0 08ED                    	OR	CH,CH
 32081 000054B2 781A                    	JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 32082 000054B4 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH
 32083 000054B6 75C9                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 32084 000054B8 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save device ID
 32085 000054B9 8E06[E405]              	MOV	ES,[CURBUF+2]
 32086                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 32087 000054BD 268A6F0B                	MOV	CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 32088                                  	;test	ch,1
 32089 000054C1 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 32090 000054C4 7523                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 32091 000054C6 E803F9                  	call	MatchAttributes
 32092 000054C9 59                      	POP	CX		; Devid back in CH
 32093 000054CA 751E                    	JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 32094 000054CC 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL		; AL = 0, Disk Node
 32095                                  make_share:
 32096                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 32097                                  	; 23/02/2024
 32098 000054CE 98                      	cbw
 32099 000054CF 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save Disk or Device node
 32100 000054D0 51                      	PUSH	CX		; Save Device ID
 32101 000054D1 88EC                    	MOV	AH,CH		; Device ID to AH
 32102 000054D3 E83201                  	CALL	DOOPEN		; Fill in SFT for share check
 32103 000054D6 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32104 000054DA 56                      	push	si
 32105 000054DB 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 32106 000054DC E8AF2F                  	call	ShareEnter
 32107 000054DF 734E                    	jnc	short MakeEndShare
 32108                                  
 32109                                  ; User failed request.
 32110 000054E1 5B                      	pop	bx
 32111 000054E2 5E                      	pop	si
 32112 000054E3 59                      	pop	cx
 32113 000054E4 58                      	pop	ax
 32114                                  
 32115                                  Make_Share_ret:
 32116 000054E5 B006                    	MOV	AL,6
 32117 000054E7 EB98                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 32118                                  
 32119                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 32120 000054E9 59                      	POP	CX		; Get back device ID
 32121                                  make_err_ret_5:
 32122 000054EA B005                    	MOV     AL,5		; Attribute mismatch
 32123                                          ; 22/11/2022
 32124 000054EC EB93                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 32125                                  
 32126                                  make_exists_dir:
 32127 000054EE B001                    	MOV	AL,1		; exists as directory, always an error
 32128                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32129 000054F0 EB8F                    	JMP	short make_err_ret
 32130                                  
 32131                                  make_save:
 32132 000054F2 50                      	PUSH	AX		; Save whether Disk or File
 32133 000054F3 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; Device ID to AH
 32134 000054F5 E86800                  	CALL	NEWENTRY
 32135 000054F8 58                      	POP	AX		; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 32136 000054F9 73A0                    	jnc	short make_retn
 32137 000054FB B002                    	MOV	AL,2		; create failed case 2
 32138                                  make_save_retn:
 32139 000054FD C3                      	retn
 32140                                  
 32141                                  make_new:
 32142 000054FE E8F1FF                  	call	make_save
 32143 00005501 72FA                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 32144                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 32145 00005503 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 32146 00005508 75F3                    	jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 32147                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 32148 0000550A 50                      	push	ax
 32149 0000550B 53                      	push	bx
 32150 0000550C 56                      	push	si
 32151 0000550D E87E2F                  	call	ShareEnter
 32152 00005510 5E                      	pop	si
 32153 00005511 5B                      	pop	bx
 32154 00005512 58                      	pop	ax
 32155 00005513 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 32156                                  
 32157                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 32158                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 32159                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 32160                                  
 32161 00005515 50                      	PUSH	AX
 32162 00005516 C43E[E205]              	LES	DI,[CURBUF]
 32163                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 32164 0000551A 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 32165                                  
 32166                                  ; 23/02/2024
 32167                                  %if 0	
 32168                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32169                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 32170                                  	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 32171                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 32172                                  	JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 32173                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32174                                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 32175                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 32176                                  	OR	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 32177                                  yesdirty8:
 32178                                  %else
 32179                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32180 0000551E E8A216                  	call	SET_BUF_DIRTY
 32181                                  %endif
 32182 00005521 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 32183                                  	; 15/12/2022
 32184 00005525 268A4600                	mov	al,[ES:BP]
 32185                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 32186                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 32187                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 32188 00005529 E87115                  	call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 32189 0000552C 58                      	POP	AX
 32190 0000552D EBB6                    	jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 32191                                  
 32192                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 32193                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 32194                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 32195                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 32196                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 32197                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 32198                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 32199                                  ;
 32200                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 32201                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 32202                                  
 32203                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32204                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32205                                  
 32206                                  MakeEndShare:
 32207 0000552F C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 32208 00005533 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 32209 00005535 E8AAC3                  	call	ECritSFT
 32210 00005538 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 32211                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32212 0000553B 50                      	push	ax
 32213 0000553C 57                      	push	di
 32214 0000553D 06                      	push	es
 32215 0000553E 9C                      	PUSHF
 32216 0000553F E8472F                  	call	ShareEnd		; remove sharing
 32217 00005542 9D                      	POPF
 32218 00005543 07                      	pop	es
 32219 00005544 5F                      	pop	di
 32220 00005545 268F05                  	pop	word [ES:DI]
 32221                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 32222 00005548 E8C4C3                  	call	LCritSFT
 32223                                  	; 22/11/2022
 32224                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32225 0000554B 5B                      	pop	bx
 32226 0000554C 5E                      	pop	si
 32227 0000554D 59                      	pop	cx
 32228 0000554E 58                      	pop	ax
 32229 0000554F E8A0FF                  	CALL	make_save
 32230                                  
 32231                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 32232                                  
 32233 00005552 72A9                    	jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 32234 00005554 50                      	push	ax
 32235 00005555 53                      	push	bx
 32236 00005556 56                      	push	si
 32237 00005557 9C                      	PUSHF
 32238 00005558 E8332F                  	call	ShareEnter
 32239 0000555B 9D                      	POPF
 32240 0000555C 5E                      	pop	si
 32241 0000555D 5B                      	pop	bx
 32242 0000555E 58                      	pop	ax

 32244                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 32245                                  
 32246                                  makeendshare_retn:
 32247 0000555F C3                      	retn
 32248                                  
 32249                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32250                                  ;
 32251                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 32252                                  ;
 32253                                  ; Inputs:
 32254                                  ;	  [THISSFT] set
 32255                                  ;	  [THISDPB] set
 32256                                  ;	  [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 32257                                  ;		  entries
 32258                                  ;	  [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 32259                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 32260                                  ;	  [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 32261                                  ;	  CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 32262                                  ;		  NC means file existed (device)
 32263                                  ;		  C  means file did not exist
 32264                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32265                                  ;	  If FILE
 32266                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32267                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32268                                  ;	  If device
 32269                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32270                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32271                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32272                                  ; Function:
 32273                                  ;	  Make a new directory entry
 32274                                  ;	  If an old one existed it is truncated first
 32275                                  ; Outputs:
 32276                                  ;	  Carry set if error
 32277                                  ;		  Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 32278                                  ;		  vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 32279                                  ;	  else
 32280                                  ;		  outputs of DOOPEN
 32281                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 32282                                  ;
 32283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32284                                  
 32285                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32286                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 32287                                  
 32288                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32289                                  	; DOSCODE:961Ah (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32290                                  
 32291                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8A34h)
 32292                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8B7Dh)
 32293                                  
 32294                                  NEWENTRY:

 32327                                  NOTVOLID:
