 32340 000055A8 B105                    	MOV	CL,5		;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 32341                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 32342

 32436                                  ; DOOPEN
 32437                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32438                                  ;
 32439                                  ; Inputs:
 32440                                  ;	  [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 32441                                  ;	  [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 32442                                  ;	  AH = Device ID byte
 32443                                  ;	  If FILE
 32444                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 32445                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 32446                                  ;	  If device
 32447                                  ;	  DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 32448                                  ;	  DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 32449                                  ;		  (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 32450                                  ; Function:
 32451                                  ;	  Fill in SFT from dir entry
 32452                                  ; Outputs:
 32453                                  ;	  CARRY CLEAR
 32454                                  ;	  sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 32455                                  ;	  sf_flags high byte = 0
 32456                                  ;	  sf_flags low byte = AH except
 32457                                  ;	  sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 32458                                  ;	  sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 32459                                  ;	  sf_position = 0
 32460                                  ;	  If device
 32461                                  ;	  sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 32462                                  ;	  sf_size = 0
 32463                                  ;	  If file
 32464                                  ;	  sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 32465                                  ;	  sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 32466                                  ;	  sf_cluspos = 0
 32467                                  ;	  sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 32468                                  ;	  sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 32469                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 32470                                  ;
 32471                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32472                                  
 32473                                  	; 23/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 32474                                  	; DOSCODE:96C3h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 32475                                  
 32476                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8AE4h)

 32733                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32734                                  ;
 32735                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 32736                                  ;
 32737                                  ; Inputs:
 32738                                  ;	  ES:BP -> DPB
 32739                                  ;	  [CURBUF] Set
 32740                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 32741                                  ;	  [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 32742                                  ; Function:
 32743                                  ;	  Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 32744                                  ; Outputs:
 32745                                  ;	  Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 32746                                  ;	  (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 32747                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 32748                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32749                                  
 32750                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 32751                                  	; 24/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 32844                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32845                                  ;
 32846                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 32847                                  ;
 32848                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 32849                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 32850                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 32851                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 32852                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 32853                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 32854                                  ;
 32855                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32856                                  
 32857                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 32858                                  	PUSH	AX
 32859                                  	lahf			; preserve flags
 32860                                  	CMP	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 32861                                  	JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 32862                                  	mov	byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0 ; reset flag
 32863                                  	push	es
 32864                                  	push	di
 32865                                  	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 32866                                  	call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 32867                                  	pop	di
 32868                                  	pop	es
 32869                                  
 32870                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 32871                                  	sahf			; restore flags
 32872                                  	POP	AX
 32873                                  	retn
 32874                                  
 32875                                  %endif

 33129                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 33130                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33131                                  ;
 33132                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 33133                                  ;
 33134                                  ; Inputs:
 33135                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 33136                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 33137                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33138                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 33139                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 33140                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 33141                                  ; Function:
 33142                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 33143                                  ;       read if necessary.
 33144                                  ; Outputs:
 33145                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 33146                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 33147                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 33148                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 33149                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 33150                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 33151                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33152                                  
 33153                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33154                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:98C2h
 33155                                  
 33156                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8BF1h) - Retro DOS v4.0 (& v4.1)
 33157                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8C2Ch) - Retro DOS v4.2
 33158                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0BE33h)
 33159                                  
 33160                                  BUFSEC:
 33161                                  	; 25/02/2024
 33162                                  	;;;
 33163                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33164 000057E9 8B16[DE0A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSNUM_HW]
 33165                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx
 33166 000057ED 8716[E80A]              	xchg	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33167 000057F1 52                      	push	dx	; [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33168                                  	;;;
 33169 000057F2 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 33170 000057F6 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 33171                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 33172 000057FA C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 33173 000057FF E89A01                          CALL    FIGREC
 33174 00005802 E83011                  	call	GETBUFFR
 33175                                  	; 25/02/2024
 33176                                  	;;;
 33177 00005805 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33178                                  	;;;
 33179 00005809 72DD                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 33180                                  
 33181 0000580B C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 33182 00005810 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 33183 00005814 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 33184 00005816 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 33185 0000581A 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 33186 0000581C 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 33187 00005820 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 33188                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 33189 00005824 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 33190                                  	;;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 33191                                  	;;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33192                                          ;lea	di,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1  ; 25/02/2024
 33193 00005829 8D7D18                  	LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 33194 0000582C 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]

 33200                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33201                                  ;
 33202                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 33203                                  ;
 33204                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 33205                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33206                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 33207                                  ;
 33208                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 33209                                  ;
 33210                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33211                                  
 33212                                  	; 25/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33213                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33214                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33215                                  BUFRD:

 33217 00005833 31C0                            xor	ax,ax			; pre-read sector

 33219 00005838 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK ; ds=ss
 33220

 33230 00005847 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1

 33232                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33233                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 33234                                  	;MOVSB

 33236                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 33237                                  
 33238                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 33239                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 33240                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 33241                                  
 33242                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 33243 00005849 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 33244                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 33245                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 33246                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33247 0000584B 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 33248 0000584D A4                      	movsb ; ****
 33249                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33250                                  	;adc	cx,0
 33251                                  	;rep	movsb
 33252                                  ;M039
 33253                                  EVENRD: ; ****

 33255                                  ;hkn; SS override

 33258                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 33259                                  	;lea	bx,[di+24] ; PCDOS 7.1	; 25/02/2024

 33265 00005860 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC ; ds<>ss ; No, leave buf where it is
 33266                                  ;M039
 33267                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33268                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 33269                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 33270                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 33271 00005862 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 33272                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 33273                                  
 33274                                  RBUFPLACEDC:

 33276                                  ;RBUFPLACED:
 33277 00005868 16                      	push	ss
 33278 00005869 1F                      	pop	ds
 33279                                  RBUFPLACED:	; 25/02/2024 (ds=ss)
 33280 0000586A C3                              retn

 33474                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 33475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33476                                  ;
 33477                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 33478                                  ;
 33479                                  ; Inputs:
 33480                                  ;	  BX = Physical cluster
 33481                                  ;	  CX = No. of records
 33482                                  ;	  DL = sector within cluster
 33483                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33484                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 33485                                  ; Outputs:
 33486                                  ;	  AX = No. of records remaining
 33487                                  ;	  BX = Transfer address
 33488                                  ;	  CX = No. or records to be transferred
 33489                                  ;	  DX = Physical sector address (LOW)
 33490                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 33491                                  ;	  DI = Next cluster
 33492                                  ;	  [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 33493                                  ;	  [NEXTADD] updated

 33495                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 33496                                  ;
 33497                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33498                                  
 33499                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 33501                                  
 33502                                  OPTIMIZE:
 33503 0000590D 52                      	PUSH	DX
 33504                                  	; 27/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33505                                  	;;;
 33506 0000590E FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33507                                  	;;;
 33508 00005912 53                      	PUSH	BX

 33510 00005913 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 33511 00005917 FEC0                    	INC	AL		; Number of sectors per cluster
 33512 00005919 88C4                    	MOV	AH,AL

 33514 0000591D 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 33515                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 33516                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 33517                                  	; 16/12/2022
 33518 0000591F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 33519                                  OPTCLUS:
 33520                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 33521                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 33522                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 33523                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 33524                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 33525                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 33526                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer

 33545                                  	;

 33571                                  FINCLUS:
 33572                                  	;MOV	[CLUSNUM],BX	; Last cluster accessed

 33612                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)

 33615                                  OP_ERR:

 33622 0000598D C3                      	retn
 33623                                  BLKDON:

 33625 00005990 28CC                    	SUB	AH,CL	  	; Number of sectors in cluster we accepted

 33627 00005994 8826[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],AH
 33628 00005998 89D1                    	MOV	CX,DX		; Anyway, make the total equal to the request

 33631                                  ;Break	<FIGREC -- Figure sector in allocation unit>
 33632                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33633                                  ;
 33634                                  ; Procedure Name : FIGREC
 33635                                  ;
 33636                                  ; Inputs:

 33638                                  ;	  BL = Sector position within cluster
 33639                                  ;	  ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33640                                  ; Outputs:
 33641                                  ;	  DX = physical sector number (LOW)
 33642                                  ;	  [HIGH_SECTOR] Physical sector address (HIGH)
 33643                                  ; No other registers affected.
 33644                                  ;
 33645                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33646                                  
 33647                                  	; 10/06/2019
 33648                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33649                                  	; DOSCODE:8D96h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33650                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 33651                                  	; DOSCODE:8D5Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 33652                                  
 33653                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33654                                  	; DOSCODE:9A89h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)

 33677                                  %if 0
 33678                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 33679                                  	;SHL	DX,CL

 33745                                  
 33746                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33747                                  ; DOSCODE:8DC2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 33748                                  
 33749                                  ; 30/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 33750                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset
 33751                                  
 33752                                  ;Break   <ALLOCATE -- Assign disk space>
 33753                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33754                                  ;
 33755                                  ; Procedure Name : ALLOCATE - Allocate Disk Space
 33756                                  ;
 33757                                  ;   ALLOCATE is called to allocate disk clusters. The new clusters are
 33758                                  ;   FAT-chained onto the end of the existing file.
 33759                                  ;
 33760                                  ;   The DPB contains the cluster # of the last free cluster allocated
 33761                                  ;   (dpb_next_free). We start at this cluster and scan towards higher
 33762                                  ;   numbered clusters, looking for the necessary free blocks.
 33763                                  ;
 33764                                  ;   Once again, fancy terminology gets in the way of correct coding. When
 33765                                  ;   using next_free, start scanning AT THAT POINT and not the one following it.
 33766                                  ;   This fixes the boundary condition bug when only free = next_free = 2.
 33767                                  ;
 33768                                  ;       If we get to the end of the disk without satisfaction:
 33769                                  ;
 33770                                  ;           if (dpb_next_free == 2) then we've scanned the whole disk.
 33771                                  ;               return (insufficient_disk_space)
 33772                                  ;           ELSE
 33773                                  ;               dpb_next_free = 2; start scan over from the beginning.
 33774                                  ;
 33775                                  ;   Note that there is no multitasking interlock. There is no race when
 33776                                  ;   examining the entrys in an in-core FAT block since there will be no
 33777                                  ;   context switch. When UNPACK context switches while waiting for a FAT read
 33778                                  ;   we are done with any in-core FAT blocks, so again there is no race. The
 33779                                  ;   only special concern is that V2 and V3 MSDOS left the last allocated
 33780                                  ;   cluster as "00"; marking it EOF only when the entire alloc request was
 33781                                  ;   satisfied. We can't allow another activation to think this cluster is
 33782                                  ;   free, so we give it a special temporary mark to show that it is, indeed,
 33783                                  ;   allocated.
 33784                                  ;
 33785                                  ;   Note that when we run out of space this algorithem will scan from
 33786                                  ;   dpb_next_free to the end, then scan from cluster 2 through the end,
 33787                                  ;   redundantly scanning the later part of the disk. This only happens when
 33788                                  ;   we run out of space, so sue me.
 33789                                  ;
 33790                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33791                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33792                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33793                                  ;   The use of FATBYT and RESTFATBYT is somewhat mysterious. Here is the
 33794                                  ;   explanation:
 33795                                  ;
 33796                                  ;   In the NUL file case (sf_firclus currently 0) ALLOCATE is called with
 33797                                  ;   entry BX = 0. What needs to be done in this case is to stuff the cluster
 33798                                  ;   number of the first cluster allocated in sf_firclus when the ALLOCATE is
 33799                                  ;   complete. THIS VALUE IS SAVED TEMPORARILY IN CLUSTER 0, HENCE THE CURRENT
 33800                                  ;   VALUE IN CLUSTER 0 MUST BE SAVED AND RESTORED. This is a side effect of
 33801                                  ;   the fact that PACK and UNPACK don't treat requests for clusters 0 and 1 as
 33802                                  ;   errors. This "stuff" is done by the call to PACK which is right before
 33803                                  ;   the
 33804                                  ;           LOOP   findfre         ; alloc more if needed
 33805                                  ;   instruction when the first cluster is allocated to the nul file. The
 33806                                  ;   value is recalled from cluster 0 and stored at sf_firclus at ads4:
 33807                                  ;
 33808                                  ;   This method is obviously useless (because it is non-reentrant) for
 33809                                  ;   multitasking, and will have to be changed. Storing the required value on
 33810                                  ;   the stack is recommended. Setting sf_firclus at the PACK of cluster 0
 33811                                  ;   (instead of actually doing the PACK) is BAD because it doesn't handle
 33812                                  ;   problems with INT 24 well.
 33813                                  ;
 33814                                  ;            C  A  V  E  A  T     P  A  T  T  E  R  S  O  N                ;
 33815                                  ;----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----+----;
 33816                                  ;                                                                          ;
 33817                                  ;       ENTRY   BX = Last cluster of file (0 if null file)
 33818                                  ;               CX = No. of clusters to allocate
 33819                                  ;               ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 33820                                  ;               [THISSFT] = Points to SFT
 33821                                  ;
 33822                                  ;       EXIT   'C' set if insufficient space
 33823                                  ;                [FAILERR] can be tested to see the reason for failure
 33824                                  ;                CX = max. no. of clusters that could be added to file
 33825                                  ;              'C' clear if space allocated
 33826                                  ;                BX = First cluster allocated
 33827                                  ;                FAT is fully updated
 33828                                  ;                sf_FIRCLUS field of SFT set if file was null
 33829                                  ;
 33830                                  ;       USES    ALL but SI, BP
 33831                                  
 33832                                  ;callmagic  proc near
 33833                                  ;       push    ds                             ;push segment of routine 
 33834                                  ;       push    Offset MagicPatch              ;push offset for routine
 33835                                  ;       retf                                   ;simulate jmp far
 33836                                  ;                                              ;far return address is on
 33837                                  ;                                              ;stack, so far return from
 33838                                  ;                                              ;call will return this routine
 33839                                  ;callmagic  endp
 33840                                  
 33841                                  ; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33842                                  ;PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9AC5h
 33843                                  
 33844                                  ; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC2h)
 33845                                  ; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C078h)
 33846                                  
 33847                                  ; 25/09/2023
 33848                                  %if 1	; 27/02/2024
 33849                                  callmagic:
 33850 000059D4 1E                      	push	ds
 33851 000059D5 36FF36[0906]            	push	word [ss:OffsetMagicPatch]
 33852 000059DA CB                      	retf	
 33853                                  %endif
 33854                                  
 33855                                  ; 10/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33856                                  %if 1
 33857                                  ALLOCATE_X:
 33858 000059DB A3[F00A]                	mov	[CCOUNT_HW],ax
 33859                                  	;jmp	short ALLOCATE
 33860                                  %endif
 33861                                  
 33862                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33863                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9ACFh
 33864                                  
 33865                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8DC9h)
 33866                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C07Fh)

 33887                                  	;				;if no patch is present

 33889                                          ;call	callmagic		;this is a near call

 33895

 33911                                  
 33912                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33913                                  	; DOSCODE:9AD6h (PCDOS 7.1, IBMDOS.COM)
 33914

 33916 000059E9 31DB                            XOR     BX,BX

 33932                                  	;;;

 33935 00005A07 72CA                            jc	short figrec_retn	; abort if error [INTERR?]
 33936                                  
 33937                                  ; 27/02/2024
 33938                                  %if 0
 33939                                          PUSH    CX
 33940                                          PUSH    BX
 33941                                  
 33942                                          MOV     DX,BX
 33943                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Ch]  ; MSDOS 3.3
 33944                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Dh]	; MSDOS 6.0
 33945                                          mov     bx,[ES:BP+DPB.NEXT_FREE]
 33946                                          cmp     bx,2
 33947                                          ja	short FINDFRE
 33948                                  
 33949                                  ;   couldn't find enough free space beyond dpb_next_free, or dpb_next_free is
 33950                                  ;   <2 or >dpb_max_clus. Reset it and restart the scan
 33951                                  
 33952                                  ads1:

 33954                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2 ; MSDOS 6.0

 33957                                                                          ;       cluster examined is 2
 33958                                  %else
 33959                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 33960                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 33961                                  	;;;
 33962 00005A09 FF36[F00A]              	push	word [CCOUNT_HW]
 33963 00005A0D 51                      	push	cx
 33964 00005A0E FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 33965 00005A12 53                      	push	bx
 33966

 33968                                  
 33969 00005A15 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33970                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx ; 0
 33971 00005A17 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0

 33973 00005A1F 891E[EA0A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],bx
 33974                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+1Dh]
 33975 00005A23 268B5E1D                	mov	bx,[es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE]
 33976 00005A27 7510                    	jnz	short ads1		; not FAT32
 33977

 33985 00005A37 7526                    	jnz	short FINDFRE
 33986                                  ads1:
 33987 00005A39 83FB02                  	cmp	bx,2
 33988 00005A3C 7721                    	ja	short FINDFRE
 33989                                  ads2:
 33990 00005A3E 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33991                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],bx
 33992 00005A40 26395E0F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],bx ; 0
 33993 00005A44 750A                    	jnz	short ads3		; not FAT32
 33994                                  
 33995                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+39h],2
 33996 00005A46 26C746390200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],2
 33997                                  	;mov	[es:bp+3Bh],bx
 33998 00005A4C 26895E3B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],bx ; 0
 33999                                  ads3:
 34000 00005A50 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 34001                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Dh],2	
 34002 00005A54 26C7461D0200            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],2
 34003 00005A5A 43                      	inc	bx ; 1
 34004                                  	;or	[es:bp+18h],bl
 34005 00005A5B 26085E18                	or	[es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],bl ; 1	
 34006                                  	;;;
 34007                                  %endif
 34008                                  
 34009                                  ;   Scanning both forwards and backwards for a free cluster
 34010                                  ;
 34011                                  ;       (BX) = forwards scan pointer
 34012                                  ;       (CX) = clusters remaining to be allocated
 34013                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 34014                                  ;       (TOS) = last cluster of file
 34015                                  
 34016                                  FINDFRE:
 34017                                  %if 0
 34018                                          INC     BX
 34019                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 34020                                          CMP	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 34021                                  	ja	short ads7	; at end of disk
 34022                                          call	UNPACK          ; check out this cluster
 34023                                          jc	short ads4	; FAT error             [INTERR?]
 34024                                          jnz	short FINDFRE	; not free, keep on truckin
 34025                                  
 34026                                  ;   Have found a free cluster. Chain it to the file
 34027                                  ;
 34028                                  ;       (BX) = found free cluster #
 34029                                  ;       (DX) = current last cluster in file
 34030                                  
 34031                                  	;;mov	[es:bp+1Ch],bx
 34032                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Dh],bx ; MSDOS 6.0
 34033                                          mov	[ES:BP+DPB.NEXT_FREE],bx ; next time start search here
 34034                                          xchg    ax,dx           ; save (dx) in ax
 34035                                          mov     dx,1            ; mark this free guy as "1"
 34036                                  	call	PACK            ; set special "temporary" mark
 34037                                          jc	short ads4	; FAT error             [INTERR?]
 34038                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1
 34039                                          ;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 34040                                  	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 34041                                          JZ	short NO_ALLOC	; No
 34042                                  	;;dec	word [es:bp+1Eh]
 34043                                          ;dec	word [es:bp+1Fh] ; MSDOS 6.0
 34044                                          DEC     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Reduce free count by 1
 34045                                  NO_ALLOC:
 34046                                          xchg    ax,dx           ; (dx) = current last cluster in file
 34047                                          XCHG    BX,DX
 34048                                          MOV     AX,DX
 34049                                  	call	PACK            ; link free cluster onto file
 34050                                                                  ;  CAVEAT.. On Nul file, first pass stuffs
 34051                                                                  ;    cluster 0 with FIRCLUS value.
 34052                                          jc	short ads4	; FAT error [INTERR?]
 34053                                          xchg    BX,AX           ; (BX) = last one we looked at
 34054                                          mov     dx,bx           ; (dx) = current end of file
 34055                                          LOOP    FINDFRE         ; alloc more if needed
 34056                                  %else
 34057                                  	; 27/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34058                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34059                                  	;;;

 34063 00005A60 7504                    	jnz	short FINDFRE2
 34064 00005A62 FF06[E80A]              	inc	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34065                                  FINDFRE2:
 34066                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 34067 00005A66 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0

 34069                                  	; FAT32

 34078 00005A7D EB04                    	jmp	short ads5
 34079                                  ads4:
 34080                                  	;cmp	bx,[es:bp+0Dh]

 34082                                  ads5:

 34084 00005A85 E9ED00                  	jmp	ads15
 34085                                  ads6:

 34087                                  	;push	cx
 34088                                  	;push	word [CCOUNT_HW]
 34089                                  	;push	bx

 34463                                  ;Break	<RELEASE -- DEASSIGN DISK SPACE>
 34464                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34465                                  ;
 34466                                  ; Procedure Name : RELEASE
 34467                                  ;
 34468                                  ; Inputs:
 34469                                  ;       BX = Cluster in file
 34470                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 34471                                  ; Function:
 34472                                  ;       Frees cluster chain starting with [BX]
 34473                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 34474                                  ; AX,BX,DX,DI all destroyed. Other registers unchanged.
 34475                                  ;
 34476                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34477                                  
 34478                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34479                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D13h
 34480                                  
 34481                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E86h)
 34482                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C27Fh)
 34483                                  
 34484                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34485                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34486                                  RELEASE:
 34487 00005BD5 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 34488                                  	
 34489                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34490                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34491                                  	;;;
 34492 00005BD7 8916[EA0A]              	mov	[CLUSDATA_HW],dx ; (dx = 0, release)
 34493                                  	;;;
 34494                                  
 34495                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D19h
 34496                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8E88h)
 34497                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C285h)
 34498                                  
 34499                                  	;entry	RELBLKS
 34500                                  RELBLKS:
 34501                                  
 34502                                  ;   Enter here with DX=0FFFFH to put an end-of-file mark in the first cluster
 34503                                  ;   and free the rest in the chain.
 34504                                  
 34505 00005BDB E80807                  	call	UNPACK
 34506                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 34507                                  	;jz	short RELEASE_flush
 34508                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34509 00005BDE 7652                            jbe	short RET12 ; jna short RET12
 34510                                  				; CCONTENT_HW:DI= Content of FAT
 34511                                   				; for given cluster (next cluster)
 34512 00005BE0 89F8                    	MOV     AX,DI
 34513 00005BE2 52                              PUSH    DX
 34514                                  
 34515                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34516                                  	;push	ax
 34517                                  	;;;
 34518                                  
 34519 00005BE3 E8AF07                  	call	PACK
 34520                                  
 34521                                  	;;; 28/12/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34522                                  	;pop	ax
 34523 00005BE6 8B16[EC0A]              	mov	dx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 34524 00005BEA 8916[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],dx ; next cluster (hw) to be released
 34525 00005BEE 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax		 ; next cluster (lw) to be released
 34526                                  	;;;
 34527                                          
 34528 00005BF0 5A                      	POP     DX
 34529                                  	;jc	short RELEASE_flush
 34530                                  	; 28/12/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34531 00005BF1 723F                    	jc	short RET12
 34532                                          
 34533 00005BF3 09D2                    	OR      DX,DX
 34534 00005BF5 751F                            JNZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; Was putting EOF mark
 34535                                  
 34536                                  ; 28/02/2024
 34537                                  %if 0
 34538                                  	;;cmp	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1 ; MSDOS 3.3
 34539                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 34540                                  	CMP     word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 ; Free count valid?
 34541                                          JZ	short NO_DEALLOC	; No
 34542                                          INC	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 34543                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 34544                                          MOV     BX,AX
 34545                                          dec     ax              	; check for "1"
 34546                                  	jz	short RELEASE_flush	; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 34547                                  %else
 34548                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34549                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34550                                  	;;;
 34551 00005BF7 3B16[EA0A]              	cmp	dx,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; > 0 ? (delete, release)
 34552 00005BFB 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC	; no, EOF (allocate, -1), (dx = 0)
 34553                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 34554 00005BFD 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 34555                                  					; Free count valid?
 34556 00005C02 7412                    	jz	short NO_DEALLOC	; No (dx = 0)
 34557                                  relblks_ifc:
 34558                                  	;inc	word ptr es:[bp+1Fh]
 34559 00005C04 26FF461F                	inc	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT] ; Increase free count by 1
 34560 00005C08 7519                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2
 34561                                  
 34562                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 34563 00005C0A 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx
 34564 00005C0E 7513                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2	; not FAT32
 34565

 34567 00005C10 26FF4621                	inc	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2]
 34568 00005C14 EB0D                    	jmp	short NO_DEALLOC2
 34569                                  NO_DEALLOC:
 34570                                  	;cmp	[es:bp+0Fh],dx
 34571 00005C16 2639560F                	cmp	[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],dx	; dx is -1 or 0
 34572                                  					; (valid 16 bit fat size is another number)
 34573 00005C1A 7507                    	jnz	short NO_DEALLOC2 ; FAT (FAT16 or FAT12)
 34574                                  					; dx = 0, FAT32

 34576 00005C1C 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],0FFFFh

 34582 00005C2B 7405                    	jz	short RET12		; is last cluster of incomplete chain
 34583                                  NO_DEALLOC3:
 34584                                  	;;;
 34585                                  %endif

 34588 00005C30 72A3                            JB	short RELEASE	; Carry clear if JMP not taken
 34589                                  
 34590                                  	; 16/12/2022
 34591                                  ; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 34592                                  ; 28/02/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34593                                  %if 0
 34594                                  RELEASE_flush:
 34595                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34596                                  	mov	al,[es:bp]
 34597                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 34598                                  	push	si		; FLUSHBUF may trash these and we guarantee
 34599                                  	push	cx		;  them to be preserved.
 34600                                  	push	es
 34601                                  	push	bp
 34602                                  	call	FLUSHBUF	; commit buffers for this drive
 34603                                  	pop	bp
 34604                                  	pop	es
 34605                                  	pop	cx
 34606                                  	pop	si
 34607                                  %endif		; 28/02/2024
 34608                                  
 34609                                  RET12:
 34610 00005C32 C3                      	retn
 34611                                  
 34612                                  ;Break	<GETEOF -- Find the end of a file>
 34613                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  ; Procedure Name : GETEOF
 34616                                  ;
 34617                                  ; Inputs:
 34618                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 34619                                  ;       BX = Cluster in a file
 34620                                  ;       DS = CS
 34621                                  ; Outputs:
 34622                                  ;       BX = Last cluster in the file
 34623                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 34624                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34627                                  
 34628                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34629                                  %if 0
 34630                                  GETEOF:
 34631                                  	call	UNPACK
 34632                                          jc	short RET12
 34633                                          PUSH    BX
 34634                                          MOV     BX,DI
 34635                                  	call	IsEOF
 34636                                          POP     BX
 34637                                          JAE     short RET12
 34638                                          MOV     BX,DI
 34639                                          JMP     short GETEOF
 34640                                  %else
 34641                                  	; 28/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 34642                                  	;;;
 34643                                  GETEOF4:	; **
 34644 00005C33 8F06[E80A]              	pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34645                                  GETEOF1:
 34646 00005C37 89C7                    	mov	di,ax
 34647 00005C39 8916[F20A]              	mov	[CLUSTERS_HW],dx ; CLUSTERS_HW:DI = Cluster Count
 34648 00005C3D 58                      	pop	ax
 34649 00005C3E 5A                      	pop	dx
 34650 00005C3F C3                      	retn
 34651                                  
 34652                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9D7Ch
 34653                                  GETEOF:
 34654 00005C40 52                      	push	dx
 34655 00005C41 50                      	push	ax
 34656 00005C42 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx ; 0	; cluster count = 0
 34657 00005C44 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 34658                                  GETEOF2:
 34659 00005C46 E89D06                  	call	UNPACK
 34660 00005C49 72EC                    	jc	short GETEOF1
 34661                                  		; CCONTENT_HW:DI = next cluster (cluster content)
 34662 00005C4B 40                      	inc	ax
 34663 00005C4C 7501                    	jnz	short GETEOF3
 34664 00005C4E 42                      	inc	dx
 34665                                  GETEOF3:
 34666 00005C4F FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34667 00005C53 53                      	push    bx
 34668                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 34669 00005C54 8B1E[EC0A]              	mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW]
 34670 00005C58 891E[E80A]              	mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 34671 00005C5C 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 34672 00005C5E E85C06                  	call	IsEOF
 34673                                  	;pop	word [CLUSTNUM_HW] ; * ; 28/02/2024
 34674 00005C61 5B                      	pop	bx
 34675                                  	;jae	short GETEOF1   ; EOF
 34676 00005C62 73CF                    	jae	short GETEOF4 ; ** ; 28/02/2024
 34677                                  	;mov	bx,[CCONTENT_HW] ; not EOF
 34678                                  	;mov	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx
 34679 00005C64 5B                      	pop	bx	; * ; 28/02/2024
 34680 00005C65 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 34681 00005C67 EBDD                    	jmp	short GETEOF2   ; get next cluster
 34682                                  	;;;
 34683                                  %endif

 34692                                  ;	TITLE	FCB - FCB parse calls for MSDOS
 34693                                  ;	NAME	FCB
 34694                                  
 34695                                  ;**	FCB.ASM - Low level routines for parsing names into FCBs and analyzing
 34696                                  ;		  filename characters
 34697                                  ;
 34698                                  ;	MakeFcb
 34699                                  ;	NameTrans
 34700                                  ;	PATHCHRCMP
 34701                                  ;	GetLet
 34702                                  ;	UCase
 34703                                  ;	GetLet3
 34704                                  ;	GetCharType

 34706                                  ;	NORMSCAN
 34707                                  ;	DELIM
 34708                                  ;
 34709                                  ;	Revision history:
 34710                                  ;
 34711                                  ;		A000  version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 34712                                  ;	
 34713                                  ;	M048 - access FILE_UCASE_TAB using DS rather than SS.
 34714                                  
 34715                                  TableLook	EQU	-1
 34716                                  
 34717                                  SCANSEPARATOR	EQU	1
 34718                                  DRVBIT		EQU	2
 34719                                  NAMBIT		EQU	4
 34720                                  EXTBIT		EQU	8

 34722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34723                                  ;
 34724                                  ; Procedure : MakeFcb
 34725                                  ;
 34726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34727                                  
 34728                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34729                                  	; DOSCODE:8E77h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34730                                  
 34731                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34732                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9DB0h
 34733                                  
 34734                                  	; (MSDOS 6.22 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:8ED3h)
 34735                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:8D92h)
 34736                                  
 34737                                  MAKEFCB:
 34738                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34739                                  	;MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0
 34740 00005C69 30D2                    	XOR	DL,DL		; Flag--not ambiguous file name
 34741                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34742 00005C6B 368816[4E03]            	mov	[ss:SpaceFlag],dl ; 0
 34743                                  	;test	al,2
 34744 00005C70 A802                    	test	AL,DRVBIT	; Use current drive field if default?
 34745 00005C72 7503                    	JNZ	short DEFDRV
 34746                                  	;MOV	BYTE [ES:DI],0	; No - use default drive
 34747                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34748 00005C74 268815                  	mov	[es:di],dl ; 0
 34749                                  DEFDRV:
 34750 00005C77 47                      	INC	DI
 34751 00005C78 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34752                                  	;test	al,4
 34753 00005C7B A804                    	test	AL,NAMBIT	; Use current name fields as default?
 34754 00005C7D 93                      	XCHG	AX,BX		; Save bits in BX
 34755 00005C7E B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34756 00005C80 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB	; If not, go fill with blanks
 34757 00005C82 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34758 00005C84 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX		; Don't fill any
 34759                                  FILLB:
 34760 00005C86 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34761 00005C88 B103                    	MOV	CL,3
 34762 00005C8A F6C308                  	test	BL,EXTBIT	; Use current extension as default
 34763 00005C8D 7404                    	JZ	short FILLB2
 34764 00005C8F 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34765 00005C91 31C9                    	XOR	CX,CX
 34766                                  FILLB2:
 34767 00005C93 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34768 00005C95 91                      	XCHG	AX,CX		; Put zero in AX
 34769 00005C96 AB                      	STOSW
 34770 00005C97 AB                      	STOSW			; Initialize two words after to zero
 34771 00005C98 83EF10                  	SUB	DI,16		; Point back at start
 34772                                  	;test	bl,1
 34773 00005C9B F6C301                  	test	BL,SCANSEPARATOR; Scan off separators if not zero
 34774 00005C9E 7409                    	JZ	short SKPSPC
 34775 00005CA0 E88800                  	CALL	SCANB		; Peel off blanks and tabs
 34776 00005CA3 E81E01                  	CALL	DELIM		; Is it a one-time-only delimiter?
 34777 00005CA6 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSCAN
 34778 00005CA8 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over the delimiter
 34779                                  SKPSPC:
 34780 00005CA9 E87F00                  	CALL	SCANB		; Always kill preceding blanks and tabs
 34781                                  NOSCAN:
 34782 00005CAC E8EC00                  	CALL	GETLET
 34783 00005CAF 761E                    	JBE	short NODRV	; Quit if termination character
 34784 00005CB1 803C3A                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],":"	; Check for potential drive specifier
 34785 00005CB4 7519                    	JNZ	short NODRV
 34786 00005CB6 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over colon
 34787 00005CB7 2C40                    	SUB	AL,"@"          ; Convert drive letter to drive number (A=1)
 34788 00005CB9 760F                    	JBE	short BADDRV	; Drive letter out of range
 34789                                  
 34790 00005CBB 50                      	PUSH	AX
 34791 00005CBC E8B71E                  	call	GetVisDrv
 34792 00005CBF 58                      	POP	AX
 34793 00005CC0 730A                    	JNC	short HAVDRV
 34794                                  
 34795                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34796                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34797                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34798 00005CC2 36803E[1006]1A          	CMP	byte [SS:DrvErr],error_not_DOS_disk ; 1Ah
 34799                                  					; if not FAT drive ;AN000;
 34800 00005CC8 7402                    	JZ	short HAVDRV		; assume ok	   ;AN000;
 34801                                  BADDRV:
 34802 00005CCA B2FF                    	MOV	DL,-1
 34803                                  HAVDRV:
 34804 00005CCC AA                      	STOSB			; Put drive specifier in first byte
 34805 00005CCD 46                      	INC	SI
 34806 00005CCE 4F                      	DEC	DI		; Counteract next two instructions
 34807                                  NODRV:
 34808 00005CCF 4E                      	DEC	SI		; Back up
 34809 00005CD0 47                      	INC	DI		; Skip drive byte
 34810                                  
 34811                                  	;entry	NORMSCAN
 34812                                  NORMSCAN:
 34813 00005CD1 B90800                  	MOV	CX,8
 34814 00005CD4 E82200                  	CALL	GETWORD 	; Get 8-letter file name
 34815 00005CD7 803C2E                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],"."
 34816 00005CDA 7510                    	JNZ	short NODOT
 34817 00005CDC 46                      	INC	SI		; Skip over dot if present
 34818                                  
 34819                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34820                                  	;mov	cx,3
 34821 00005CDD B103                    	mov	cl,3	; ch=0
 34822                                  
 34823                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34824                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34825                                  	;TEST	word [SS:DOS34_FLAG],DBCS_VOLID2 ; 100h ;AN000;
 34826                                  	; 10/06/2019
 34827 00005CDF 36F606[1206]01          	test	byte [SS:DOS34_FLAG+1],(DBCS_VOLID2>>8) ; 1
 34828 00005CE5 7402                    	JZ	short VOLOK				;AN000;
 34829 00005CE7 A4                      	MOVSB			; 2nd byte of DBCS	;AN000;
 34830                                  	; 24/09/2023
 34831                                  	;MOV	CX,2					;AN000;
 34832 00005CE8 49                      	dec	cx  ; cx=2
 34833                                  	;JMP	SHORT contvol				;AN000;
 34834                                  VOLOK:
 34835                                  	;MOV	CX,3		; Get 3-letter extension
 34836                                  contvol:
 34837 00005CE9 E81300                  	CALL	MUSTGETWORD
 34838                                  NODOT:
 34839 00005CEC 88D0                    	MOV	AL,DL
 34840                                  
 34841                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34842                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],0FEFFh
 34843                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34844 00005CEE 368026[1206]FE          	and	byte [ss:DOS34_FLAG+1],0FEh ; (~DBCS_VOLID2)>>8
 34845                                  	;and	word [ss:DOS34_FLAG],~DBCS_VOLID2 ; ### BUG FIX ###
 34846                                  
 34847 00005CF4 C3                      	retn
 34848                                  
 34849                                  NONAM:
 34850 00005CF5 01CF                    	ADD	DI,CX
 34851 00005CF7 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34852 00005CF8 C3                      	retn
 34853                                  
 34854                                  GETWORD:
 34855 00005CF9 E89F00                  	CALL	GETLET		
 34856 00005CFC 76F7                    	JBE	short NONAM	; Exit if invalid character
 34857 00005CFE 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34858                                  
 34859                                  ;	UGH!!! Horrible bug here that should be fixed at some point:
 34860                                  ;	If the name we are scanning is longer than CX, we keep on reading!
 34861                                  
 34862                                  MUSTGETWORD:
 34863 00005CFF E89900                  	CALL	GETLET
 34864                                  
 34865                                  ;	If spaceFlag is set then we allow spaces in a pathname
 34866                                  
 34867                                  ;IF NOT TABLELOOK
 34868                                  ;	JB	short FILLNAM  ; MSDOS 3.3
 34869                                  ;ENDIF
 34870 00005D02 750C                    	JNZ	short MustCheckCX
 34871                                  
 34872                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34873 00005D04 36F606[4E03]FF          	test	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],0FFh
 34874 00005D0A 7419                    	JZ	short FILLNAM
 34875 00005D0C 3C20                    	CMP	AL," "
 34876 00005D0E 7515                    	JNZ	short FILLNAM
 34877                                  
 34878                                  MustCheckCX:
 34879 00005D10 E3ED                    	JCXZ	MUSTGETWORD
 34880 00005D12 49                      	DEC	CX
 34881 00005D13 3C2A                    	CMP	AL,"*"          ; Check for ambiguous file specifier
 34882 00005D15 7504                    	JNZ	short NOSTAR
 34883 00005D17 B03F                    	MOV	AL,"?"
 34884 00005D19 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34885                                  NOSTAR:
 34886 00005D1B AA                      	STOSB
 34887 00005D1C 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,"?"
 34888 00005D1E 75DF                    	JNZ	short MUSTGETWORD
 34889 00005D20 80CA01                  	OR	DL,1		; Flag ambiguous file name
 34890 00005D23 EBDA                    	JMP	short MUSTGETWORD
 34891                                  FILLNAM:
 34892 00005D25 B020                    	MOV	AL," "
 34893 00005D27 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 34894 00005D29 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34895 00005D2A C3                      	retn
 34896                                  
 34897                                  SCANB:
 34898 00005D2B AC                      	LODSB
 34899 00005D2C E89D00                  	CALL	SPCHK
 34900 00005D2F 74FA                    	JZ	short SCANB
 34901 00005D31 4E                      	DEC	SI
 34902                                  scanb_retn:
 34903 00005D32 C3                      	retn
 34904                                  
 34905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34906                                  ;
 34907                                  ; Procedure Name : NameTrans
 34908                                  ;
 34909                                  ; NameTrans is used by FindPath to scan off an element of a path. We must
 34910                                  ; allow spaces in pathnames
 34911                                  ;
 34912                                  ;   Inputs:	DS:SI points to start of path element
 34913                                  ;   Outputs:	Name1 has unpacked name, uppercased
 34914                                  ;		ES = DOSGroup
 34915                                  ;		DS:SI advanced after name
 34916                                  ;   Registers modified: DI,AX,DX,CX
 34917                                  ;
 34918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34919                                  
 34920                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34921                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34922                                  
 34923                                  	; 29/02/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34924                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:9E7Ch
 34925                                  
 34926                                  NameTrans:
 34927                                  ;hkn; SS override
 34928 00005D33 36C606[4E03]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:SpaceFlag],1
 34929 00005D39 16                      	push	ss
 34930 00005D3A 07                      	pop	es
 34931                                  
 34932                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 34933 00005D3B BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 34934 00005D3E 57                      	PUSH	DI
 34935                                  
 34936                                  ; 29/02/2024
 34937                                  %if 0
 34938                                  	MOV	AX,'  '	; 2020h
 34939                                  	MOV	CX,5
 34940                                  	STOSB
 34941                                  	REP	STOSW		; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34942                                  	XOR	AL,AL		; Set stuff for NORMSCAN
 34943                                  	MOV	DL,AL
 34944                                  %else
 34945                                  	; 29/02/2024
 34946                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 34947                                  	;;;
 34948 00005D3F B020                    	mov     al, 20h ; ' '
 34949 00005D41 B90B00                  	mov     cx, 11
 34950 00005D44 F3AA                    	rep stosb               ; Fill "FCB" at NAME1 with spaces
 34951 00005D46 91                      	xchg    ax, cx
 34952 00005D47 99                      	cwd
 34953                                  	;;;
 34954                                  %endif
 34955                                  
 34956 00005D48 AA                      	STOSB
 34957 00005D49 5F                      	POP	DI
 34958                                  
 34959 00005D4A E884FF                  	CALL	NORMSCAN
 34960                                  
 34961                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 34962 00005D4D 36803E[4B05]E5          	CMP	byte [SS:NAME1],0E5H
 34963 00005D53 75DD                    	jnz	short scanb_retn
 34964 00005D55 36C606[4B05]05          	MOV	byte [SS:NAME1],5 ; Magic name translation
 34965 00005D5B C3                      	retn
 34966                                  
 34967                                  ;Break	<GETLET, DELIM -- CHECK CHARACTERS AND CONVERT>
 34968                                  ;============================================================================
 34969                                  
 34970                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34971                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34972                                  
 34973                                  ;If TableLook
 34974                                  
 34975                                  ;hkn; Table	SEGMENT
 34976                                  ;	PUBLIC	CharType
 34977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34978                                  
 34979                                  ; Character type table for file name scanning
 34980                                  ; Table provides a mapping of characters to validity bits.
 34981                                  ; Four bits are provided for each character. Values 7Dh and above
 34982                                  ; have all bits set, so that part of the table is chopped off, and
 34983                                  ; the translation routine is responsible for screening these values.
 34984                                  ; The bit values are defined in DOSSYM.INC
 34985                                  
 34986                                  ;	      ; ^A and NUL
 34987                                  ;CharType:
 34988                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34989                                  ;	      ; ^C and ^B
 34990                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34991                                  ;	      ; ^E and ^D
 34992                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34993                                  ;	      ; ^G and ^F
 34994                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34995                                  ;	      ; TAB and BS
 34996                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34997                                  ;	      ; ^K and ^J
 34998                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 34999                                  ;	      ; ^M and ^L
 35000                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35001                                  ;	      ; ^O and ^N
 35002                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35003                                  ;	      ; ^Q and ^P
 35004                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35005                                  ;	      ; ^S and ^R
 35006                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35007                                  ;	      ; ^U and ^T
 35008                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35009                                  ;	      ; ^W and ^V
 35010                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35011                                  ;	      ; ^Y and ^X
 35012                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35013                                  ;	      ; ESC and ^Z
 35014                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35015                                  ;	      ; ^] and ^;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35017                                  ;	      ; ^_ and ^^
 35018                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35019                                  ;	      ; ! and SPACE
 35020                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FCHK+FDELIM+FSPCHK)
 35021                                  ;	      ; # and "
 35022                                  ;	 db   LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK)
 35023                                  ;	      ; $ - )
 35024                                  ;	 db   3 dup (0FFh)
 35025                                  ;	      ; + and *
 35026                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 35027                                  ;	      ; - and '
 35028                                  ;	 db   NOT (FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM)
 35029                                  ;	      ; / and .
 35030                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35031                                  ;	      ; 0 - 9
 35032                                  ;	 db   5 dup (0FFh)
 35033                                  ;	      ; ; and :
 35034                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 35035                                  ;	      ; = and <
 35036                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM) AND 0Fh
 35037                                  ;	      ; ? and >
 35038                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 35039                                  ;	      ; A - Z
 35040                                  ;	 db   13 dup (0FFh)
 35041                                  ;	      ; \ and [
 35042                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR 0Fh
 35043                                  ;	      ; ^ and ]
 35044                                  ;	 db   LOW ((NOT FFCB+FCHK) SHL 4) OR LOW (NOT FFCB+FCHK) AND 0Fh
 35045                                  ;	      ; _ - {
 35046                                  ;	 db   15 dup (0FFh)
 35047                                  ;	      ; } and |
 35048                                  ;	 db   NOT FFCB+FCHK+FDELIM
 35049                                  
 35050                                  ;CharType_last equ ($ - CharType) * 2	; This is the value of the last
 35051                                  ;					; character in the table
 35052                                  
 35053                                  ;FCHK	equ 1		; normal name char, no chks needed
 35054                                  ;FDELIM	equ 2		; is a delimiter
 35055                                  ;FSPCHK	equ 4		; set if character is not a space or equivalent
 35056                                  ;FFCB	equ 8		; is valid in an FCB
 35057                                  
 35058                                  ; DOSCODE:8FD2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 35059                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35060                                  ; DOSCODE:8F76h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 35061                                  
 35062                                  CharType: ; 63 bytes
 35063 00005D5C 6666666606666666                db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 06h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 0-7
 35064 00005D64 6666666666666666        	db  66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h, 66h ; 8-15
 35065 00005D6C F8F6FFFFFF4FF46E        	db 0F8h,0F6h,0FFh,0FFh,0FFh, 4Fh,0F4h, 6Eh ; 16-23
