 37001                                  %endif
 37002 0000638D 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 37003 0000638F F8                      	CLC
 37004 00006390 7501                    	JNZ	short OKU_RET 		; Try to ignore bad FAT
 37005 00006392 F9                      	STC				; User said FAIL
 37006                                  OKU_RET:
 37007 00006393 58                      	POP	AX
 37008                                  hurtfat_retn:
 37009 00006394 C3                      	retn
 37010                                  
 37011                                  ; DOSCODE:9565h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37012                                  
 37013                                  ;Break	<PACK -- PACK FAT ENTRIES>
 37014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37015                                  ;
 37016                                  ; Procedure Name : PACK
 37017                                  ;
 37018                                  ; Inputs:
 37019                                  ;	BX = Cluster number
 37020                                  ;	DX = Data
 37021                                  ;	ES:BP = Pointer to drive DPB
 37022                                  ; Outputs:
 37023                                  ;	The data is stored in the FAT at the given cluster.
 37024                                  ;	SI,DX,DI all destroyed
 37025                                  ;	Carry set means error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37026                                  ;	No other registers affected
 37027                                  ;
 37028                                  ; NOTE: if BX = 0 then data in DX is stored in CL0FATENTRY.
 37029                                  ;
 37030                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37031                                  
 37032                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37033                                  
 37034                                  	; INPUT:
 37035                                  	;  [CLUSDATA_HW]:DX = cluster data/content
 37036                                  	;  [CLUSTNUM_HW]:BX = cluster number (to be updated)
 37037                                  	;  ES:BP = pointer to DPB
 37038                                  
 37039                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37040                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37041                                  PACK:
 37042                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; M014 - start
 37043 00006395 09DB                    	or	bx,bx			; Q: are we packing cluster 0
 37044 00006397 7513                    	jnz	short p_cont		; N: proceed with normal pack
 37045                                  
 37046                                  ; 02/03/2024
 37047                                  %if 0
 37048                                  	mov	[CL0FATENTRY],dx	; Y: place value in CL0FATENTRY
 37049                                  	retn				; done
 37050                                  %else
 37051                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37052                                  	;;;
 37053 00006399 391E[E80A]              	cmp	[CLUSTNUM_HW],bx ; 0
 37054 0000639D 750D                    	jnz	short p_cont
 37055                                  
 37056                                  	;push	ax
 37057                                  	;mov	ax,[CLUSDATA_HW]	; Cluster Data/Content (High Word)
 37058                                  	;mov	[CL0FATENTRY_HW],ax
 37059                                  	;pop	ax
 37060 0000639F FF36[EA0A]              	push	word [CLUSDATA_HW]
 37061 000063A3 8F06[3B0F]              	pop	word [CL0FATENTRY_HW]
 37062                                  
 37063 000063A7 8916[8100]              	mov	[CL0FATENTRY],dx
 37064 000063AB C3                      	retn
 37065                                  	;;;
 37066                                  %endif
 37067                                  
 37068                                  p_cont:					; M014 - end
 37069                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 37070 000063AC E8BE00                  	CALL	MAPCLUSTER
 37071 000063AF 72B4                    	JC	short _DoContext
 37072 000063B1 8B35                    	MOV	SI,[DI]
 37073 000063B3 740B                    	JZ	short ALIGNED 		; byte (not nibble) aligned
 37074 000063B5 51                      	PUSH	CX			; move data to upper 12 bits
 37075 000063B6 B104                    	MOV	CL,4
 37076 000063B8 D3E2                    	SHL	DX,CL
 37077 000063BA 59                      	POP	CX
 37078 000063BB 83E60F                  	AND	SI,0FH			; leave in original low 4 bits
 37079 000063BE EB2B                    	JMP	SHORT PACKIN
 37080                                  
 37081                                  ALIGNED:
 37082                                  
 37083                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37084                                  	;;;
 37085 000063C0 E89500                  	call	IsFAT32
 37086 000063C3 7313                    	jnb	short p_fat
 37087                                  
 37088 000063C5 368B36[EA0A]            	mov	si,[ss:CLUSDATA_HW]
 37089 000063CA 337502                  	xor	si,[di+2]		; hw of cluster number
 37090                                  					; offset CLUSSAVE+2
 37091 000063CD 81E6FF0F                	and	si,0FFFh
 37092 000063D1 317502                  	xor	[di+2],si
 37093 000063D4 8915                    	mov	[di],dx
 37094 000063D6 EB17                    	jmp	short PACKIN2
 37095                                  p_fat:
 37096                                  	;;;
 37097                                  
 37098                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Dh],0FF6h
 37099 000063D8 26817E0DF60F            	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER],4096-10 ; MZ 16 bit fats?
 37100 000063DE 7309                    	JAE	short Pack16		; MZ yes, go clobber original data
 37101 000063E0 81E600F0                	AND	SI,0F000h		; MZ leave in upper 4 bits of original
 37102                                  	;AND	DX,0FFFh		; MZ store only 12 bits
 37103                                  	; 01/07/2024
 37104 000063E4 80E60F                  	and	dh,0Fh
 37105 000063E7 EB02                    	JMP	SHORT PACKIN		; MZ go store
 37106                                  Pack16:
 37107 000063E9 31F6                    	XOR	SI,SI			; MZ no original data
 37108                                  PACKIN:
 37109 000063EB 09D6                    	OR	SI,DX
 37110 000063ED 8935                    	MOV	[DI],SI
 37111                                  
 37112                                  PACKIN2:	; 02/03/2024
 37113                                  
 37114                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37115 000063EF 36C536[E205]            	LDS	SI,[SS:CURBUF]
 37116                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37117 000063F4 F6440540                	TEST	byte [SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 37118                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 37119 000063F8 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty11	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 37120                                  	; 10/06/2019
 37121 000063FA E8D207                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 37122                                  	
 37123                                  	;or	byte [si+5],40h
 37124 000063FD 804C0540                	OR	byte [SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 37125                                  yesdirty11:				;LB.				;AN000;
 37126                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37127 00006401 36803E[7805]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:CLUSSPLIT],0	; 15/08/2018
 37128                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37129 00006407 16                      	push	ss
 37130 00006408 1F                      	pop	ds
 37131 00006409 7489                    	jz	short hurtfat_retn	; Carry clear
 37132 0000640B 50                      	PUSH	AX
 37133                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37134                                  	;;;
 37135 0000640C FF36[E80A]              	push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37136                                  	;;;
 37137 00006410 53                      	PUSH	BX
 37138 00006411 51                      	PUSH	CX
 37139 00006412 A1[8E05]                	MOV	AX,[CLUSSAVE]
 37140 00006415 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 37141                                  	;;;add	si,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 37142                                  	;;add	si,20 ; MSDOS 6.0

 37153

 37157

 37159 00006429 8B16[9005]              	MOV	DX,[CLUSSEC]
 37160

 37173                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 37174 0000643B 7507                    	JNZ	short yesdirty12	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 37175 0000643D E88F07                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT 	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 37176                                  	
 37177                                  	;or	byte [di+5],40h
 37178 00006440 804D0540                	OR	byte [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty 
 37179                                  yesdirty12:
 37180                                  	;;;add	di,16
 37181                                  	;;add	di,20 ; MSDOS 6.0
 37182                                  	;ADD	DI,BUFINSIZ
 37183                                  	;DEC	DI

 37185                                  	;add	di,23 ; PCDOS 7.1

 37206 00006457 C3                      	retn

 37208                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 37209

 37212                                  IsFAT32:

 37216

 37220                                  
 37221                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+2Dh],0FFF6h
 37222 00006466 26837E2DF6              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER],0FFF6h

 37224 0000646B F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 -> FAT32
 37225                                  isfat32eof_2:
 37226 0000646C C3                      	retn

 37228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37229                                  
 37230                                  ; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37231                                  
 37232                                  ;Break	<MAPCLUSTER - BUFFER A FAT SECTOR>
 37233                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37234                                  ;
 37235                                  ; Procedure Name : MAPCLUSTER
 37236                                  ;
 37237                                  ; Inputs:
 37238                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 37239                                  ;	BX Is cluster number
 37240                                  ; Function:
 37241                                  ;	Get a pointer to the cluster
 37242                                  ; Outputs:
 37243                                  ;	DS:DI Points to contents of FAT for given cluster
 37244                                  ;	DS:SI Points to start of buffer
 37245                                  ;	Zero Not set if cluster data is in high 12 bits of word
 37246                                  ;	Zero set if cluster data is in low 12 or 16 bits
 37247                                  ;	Carry set if failed.
 37248                                  ; SI is destroyed.
 37249                                  ;
 37250                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37251                                  
 37252                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37253                                  	; DOSCODE:9601h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37254                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37255                                  	; DOSCODE:95A5h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37256                                  
 37257                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37258                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A5D7h
 37259                                  
 37260                                  MAPCLUSTER:
 37261                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5A15h
 37262 0000646D C606[7805]00            	MOV	BYTE [CLUSSPLIT],0
 37263                                  	;SAVE	<AX,BX,CX,DX>
 37264 00006472 50                      	push	ax
 37265 00006473 53                      	push	bx
 37266 00006474 51                      	push	cx
 37267 00006475 52                      	push	dx
 37268                                  	; 02/03/2024
 37269                                  	;MOV	AX,BX			; AX = BX
 37270                                  
 37271                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37272                                  	;;;
 37273                                  	;push	word [CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37274 00006476 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx
 37275 00006478 8B16[E80A]              	mov	dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37276                                  	;
 37277 0000647C 52                      	push	dx ; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37278                                  	;
 37279 0000647D 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 37280 0000647F E8D6FF                  	call	IsFAT32
 37281 00006482 730E                    	jnc	short mapcl1 ; not FAT32
 37282                                  	; FAT32
 37283 00006484 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 37284 00006486 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 37285 00006488 D1D7                    	rcl	di,1
 37286 0000648A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 37287 0000648C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 37288 0000648E D1D7                    	rcl	di,1
 37289                                  	; DI:DX:AX = 4*(DX:AX)
 37290 00006490 EB14                    	jmp	short Map16		; 32 bit FAT	
 37291                                  mapcl1:
 37292                                  	;;;
 37293 00006492 26817E0DF60F            	CMP	word [ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER],4096-10  ; MZ 16 bit fat?
 37294                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37295                                  	;JAE	short Map16		; MZ yes, do 16 bit algorithm
 37296                                  	;SHR	AX,1			; AX = BX/2
 37297                                  	;
 37298                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37299                                  	;;;
 37300 00006498 7304                    	jae	short mapcl2		; 16 bit FAT
 37301                                  	; 12 bit FAT
 37302 0000649A D1EA                    	shr	dx,1
 37303 0000649C D1D8                    	rcr     ax,1
 37304                                  mapcl2:
 37305 0000649E 01D8                    	add     ax,bx
 37306 000064A0 1316[E80A]              	adc     dx,[CLUSTNUM_HW]
 37307 000064A4 11FF                    	adc	di,di
 37308                                  	;;;
 37309                                  Map16:	
 37310                                  
 37311                                  ; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37312                                  ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37313                                  %if 0
 37314                                  	; MSDOS 6.0			; MZ skip prev => AX=2*BX
 37315                                  	XOR	DI,DI ; *		; >32mb fat ;AN000;
 37316                                  	
 37317                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37318                                  	ADD	AX,BX			; AX = 1.5*fat = byte offset in fat
 37319                                  	ADC	DI,DI ; * MSDOS 6.0	; >32mb fat ;DI is zero before op;AN000;
 37320                                  %endif
 37321                                  
 37322 000064A6 268B4E02                	MOV	CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 37323                                  
 37324                                  ;IF FastDiv
 37325                                  ;
 37326                                  ; Gross hack: 99% of all disks have 512 bytes per sector. We test for this
 37327                                  ; case and apply a really fast algorithm to get the desired results
 37328                                  ;
 37329                                  ; Divide method takes 157+4*4=173 (MOV and DIV)
 37330                                  ; Fast method takes 39+20*4=119
 37331                                  ;
 37332                                  ; This saves a bunch.
 37333                                  
 37334 000064AA 81F90002                	CMP	CX,512			; 4  Is this 512 byte sector?
 37335 000064AE 751C                    	jne	short _DoDiv		; 4  for no jump
 37336                                  
 37337                                  ; 02/04/2024
 37338                                  %if 0
 37339                                  	MOV	DX,AX			; 2  get set for remainder
 37340                                  	AND	DX,512-1		; 4  Form remainder
 37341                                  	MOV	AL,AH			; 2  Quotient in formation in AL
 37342                                  	; MDOS 3.3
 37343                                  	;shr	al,1
 37344                                  	; MDOS 6.0
 37345                                  	shr	di,1			; 2
 37346                                  	rcr	al,1			; 2
 37347                                  	; MDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37348                                  	xor	ah,ah			; 3
 37349                                  %else
 37350                                  	; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37351                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37352                                  	;;;
 37353 000064B0 50                      	push	ax
 37354 000064B1 D1EF                    	shr	di,1
 37355 000064B3 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 37356 000064B5 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 37357 000064B7 88E0                    	mov	al,ah			; 9 bit shift to right
 37358 000064B9 88D4                    	mov	ah,dl
 37359 000064BB 88F2                    	mov	dl,dh
 37360 000064BD 30F6                    	xor	dh,dh
 37361 000064BF D1EF                    	shr	di,1
 37362 000064C1 10F6                    	adc	dh,dh
 37363 000064C3 87D7                    	xchg	dx,di		; DI:AX = sector contains requested cluster data
 37364 000064C5 5A                      	pop	dx
 37365 000064C6 81E2FF01                	and	dx,1FFh			; offset in sector
 37366                                  	;;;
 37367                                  %endif
 37368 000064CA EB07                    	jmp	short DivDone		; 16
 37369                                  
 37370                                  _DoDiv:
 37371                                  ;ENDIF
 37372                                  
 37373                                  ; 02/04/2024
 37374                                  %if 0
 37375                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 37376                                  	;xor	dx,dx
 37377                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37378                                  	mov	dx,di			; 2
 37379                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37380                                  	DIV	CX			; 155 AX is FAT sector # DX is sector index
 37381                                  %else
 37382                                  	; 02/04/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37383                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37384                                  	;;;
 37385 000064CC 97                      	xchg	ax,di
 37386 000064CD 92                      	xchg	ax,dx
 37387 000064CE F7F1                    	div	cx
 37388 000064D0 97                      	xchg	ax,di
 37389 000064D1 F7F1                    	div	cx
 37390                                  	;jmp	short DivDone
 37391                                  	;;;
 37392                                  %endif
 37393                                  
 37394                                  ;IF FastDiv
 37395                                  DivDone:
 37396                                  ;ENDIF
 37397                                  	;add	ax,[es:bp+6]
 37398 000064D3 26034606                	ADD	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_FAT]
 37399                                  	
 37400                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37401                                  	;;;
 37402 000064D7 83D700                  	adc	di,0
 37403                                  	;;;
 37404                                  
 37405 000064DA 49                      	DEC	CX			; CX is sector size - 1
 37406                                  
 37407                                  	;SAVE	<AX,DX,CX>
 37408                                  
 37409                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37410                                  	;;;
 37411 000064DB 57                      	push	di ; 4*
 37412                                  	;;;
 37413 000064DC 50                      	push	ax ; 3*
 37414 000064DD 52                      	push	dx ; 2*
 37415 000064DE 51                      	push	cx ; 1*
 37416                                  
 37417 000064DF 89C2                    	MOV	DX,AX
 37418                                  
 37419                                  	; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37420                                  	; mov [HIGH_SECTOR],di ; *!* ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 37421 000064E1 89FB                    	mov	bx,di
 37422                                  	;
 37423                                  
 37424                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37425                                  	; 22/09/2023
 37426                                  	;MOV	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0 ; *! ;F.C. >32mb  low sector #
 37427                                  	;
 37428                                  	; MDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 37429                                  	;XOR	AL,AL	   ; *
 37430                                  	;MOV	SI,1	   ; *
 37431                                  	;;invoke GETBUFFRB ; *
 37432                                  	;call	GETBUFFRB  ; *
 37433                                  	; 22/09/2023
 37434 000064E3 E83D04                  	call	GETBUFFRC  ; *! ; *!* ; 02/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 37435                                  
 37436                                  	;RESTORE <CX,AX,DX>		; CX is sec siz-1, AX is offset in sec
 37437 000064E6 59                      	pop	cx ; 1*
 37438 000064E7 58                      	pop	ax ; 2*
 37439 000064E8 5A                      	pop	dx ; 3*
 37440                                  	; 02/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37441                                  	;;;
 37442 000064E9 5B                      	pop	bx ; 4*
 37443                                  	;;;
 37444                                  
 37445 000064EA 725A                    	JC	short MAP_POP
 37446                                  
 37447 000064EC C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]
 37448                                  	;;;lea	di,[si+16]
 37449                                  	;;lea	di,[si+20] ; MSDOS 6.0

 37499                                  	;;;

 37501                                  	;;;
 37502                                  	;RESTORE <DX,CX,BX>
 37503 0000652E 5A                      	pop	dx
 37504 0000652F 59                      	pop	cx

 37513                                  	;;;

 37539                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37540                                  ; DOSCODE:96B3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37541                                  ; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37542                                  ; DOSCODE:9657h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37543                                  
 37544                                  ; 03/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)

 37547                                  ;Break	<FATREAD_SFT/FATREAD_CDS -- CHECK DRIVE GET FAT>
 37548                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37549                                  ;
 37550                                  ; Procedure Name : FATREAD_SFT
 37551                                  ;
 37552                                  ; Inputs:
 37553                                  ;	ES:DI points to an SFT for the drive of interest (local only,
 37554                                  ;		giving a NET SFT will produce system crashing results).
 37555                                  ;	DS DOSDATA
 37556                                  ; Function:
 37557                                  ;	Can be used by an SFT routine (like CLOSE) to invalidate buffers
 37558                                  ;	if disk changed.
 37559                                  ;	In other respects, same as FATREAD_CDS.
 37560                                  ;	(note ES:DI destroyed!)
 37561                                  ; Outputs:
 37562                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37563                                  ; NOTE: This routine may cause FATREAD_CDS to "miss" a disk change
 37564                                  ;	as far as invalidating curdir_ID is concerned.
 37565                                  ;	Since getting a true disk changed on this call is a screw up
 37566                                  ;	anyway, that's the way it goes.
 37567                                  ;
 37568                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37569                                  
 37570                                  FATREAD_SFT:
 37571 0000654F 26C46D07                	LES	BP,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 37572                                  
 37573                                  fatread_gotdpb:	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37574                                  	; 27/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37575                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] ; [es:bp+0]
 37576                                  	; 15/12/2022
 37577 00006553 268A4600                	mov	AL,[ES:BP]
 37578 00006557 A2[7605]                	MOV	[THISDRV],AL
 37579 0000655A E808A1                  	call	GOTDPB			; Set THISDPB
 37580                                  	;CALL	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37581                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37582 0000655D E99C00                  	jmp	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37583                                  ;fatread_sft_retn:
 37584                                  	;retn
 37585                                  
 37586                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37587                                  ;
 37588                                  ; Procedure Name : FATREAD_CDS
 37589                                  ;
 37590                                  ; Inputs:
 37591                                  ;	DS:DOSDATA
 37592                                  ;	ES:DI points to an CDS for the drive of interest (local only,
 37593                                  ;		giving a NET or NUL CDS will produce system crashing results).
 37594                                  ; Function:
 37595                                  ;	If disk may have been changed, media is determined and buffers are
 37596                                  ;	flagged invalid. If not, no action is taken.
 37597                                  ; Outputs:
 37598                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameter block
 37599                                  ;	THISDPB = ES:BP
 37600                                  ;	THISDRV set
 37601                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 37602                                  ; DS preserved , all other registers destroyed
 37603                                  ;
 37604                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37605                                  
 37606                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37607                                  	; DOSCODE:96C5h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 37608                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37609                                  	; DOSCODE:9669h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 37610                                  
 37611                                  	; 03/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37612                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A6D8h
 37613                                  	; (Windows ME IO.SYS - BIOSCODE:0C644h)
 37614                                  
 37615                                  FATREAD_CDS:
 37616 00006560 06                      	PUSH	ES
 37617 00006561 57                      	PUSH	DI
 37618                                  
 37619                                  	;les	bp,[es:di+45h]
 37620 00006562 26C46D45                	LES	BP,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr]
 37621                                  
 37622                                  ; 03/03/2024
 37623                                  %if 0
 37624                                  	; 27/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37625                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE] ; [es:bp+0]
 37626                                  	; 15/12/2022
 37627                                  	mov	AL,[ES:BP]
 37628                                  	MOV	[THISDRV],AL
 37629                                  	call	GOTDPB			;Set THISDPB
 37630                                  	CALL	FAT_GOT_DPB
 37631                                  %else
 37632                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37633                                  	;;;
 37634 00006566 E8EAFF                  	call	fatread_gotdpb
 37635                                  	;;;
 37636                                  %endif
 37637 00006569 5F                      	POP	DI			;Get back CDS pointer
 37638 0000656A 07                      	POP	ES
 37639 0000656B 72E1                    	jc	short fatread_sft_retn
 37640 0000656D 7542                    	JNZ	short NO_CHANGE		;Media NOT changed
 37641                                  
 37642                                  ;	Media changed. We now need to find all CDS structures which use this
 37643                                  ;	DPB and invalidate their ID pointers.
 37644                                  
 37645                                  MED_CHANGE:
 37646                                  	;XOR	AX,AX
 37647                                  	;DEC	AX			; AX = -1
 37648                                  	; 03/03/2024
 37649 0000656F B8FFFF                  	mov	ax,0FFFFh ; -1
 37650                                  	
 37651 00006572 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 37652 00006573 8A0E[4700]              	MOV	CL,[CDSCOUNT]
 37653 00006577 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH			; CX is number of structures
 37654                                  	;lds	si,[es:di+45h]
 37655 00006579 26C57545                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr] ; Find all CDS with this devptr
 37656                                  
 37657                                  ;hkn; SS override
 37658                                  
 37659                                  ;	Find all CDSs with this DevPtr
 37660                                  ;
 37661                                  ;	(ax) = -1
 37662                                  ;	(ds:si) = DevPtr
 37663                                  
 37664 0000657D 36C43E[3C00]            	LES	DI,[SS:CDSADDR]		; (es:di) = CDS pointer
 37665                                  frcd20: 
 37666                                  	;;test	word [es:di+43h],8000h
 37667                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+curdir.flags],curdir_isnet
 37668 00006582 26F6454480              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+curdir.flags+1],(curdir_isnet>>8)
 37669 00006587 7522                    	JNZ	short frcd25		; Leave NET guys alone!!
 37670                                  
 37671                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 37672                                  	;push	es
 37673                                  	;push	di
 37674                                  	;les	di,[es:di+45h]
 37675                                  	;;les	di,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr]
 37676                                  	;call	POINTCOMP
 37677                                  	;pop	di
 37678                                  	;pop	es
 37679                                  	;jnz	short frcd25
 37680                                  
 37681                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 37682 00006589 263B7545                	cmp	si,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr]
 37683 0000658D 751C                    	jne	short frcd25		; no match
 37684 0000658F 8CDB                    	mov	bx,ds
 37685 00006591 263B5D47                	cmp	bx,[ES:DI+curdir.devptr+2]
 37686 00006595 7514                    	jne	short frcd25		; CDS not for this drive
 37687                                  
 37688                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 37691                                  	;JZ	short frcd25 ; = 0	; If root (0), leave root
 37692                                  		; !!! test es:[di+49h],ax
 37693                                  		; !!! jz short frcd25	
 37694                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM bug (!?) ; Erdogan Tan - 03/03/2024
 37695                                  		; test dword ptr es:[di+49h],-1 ; Win ME - BIOSCODE:0C694h
 37696                                  		; jz short frcd25

 37699 0000659B 7506                    	jnz	short frcd24

 37702                                  	;;;
 37703                                  	;test	[es:di+4Bh],ax

 37705 000065A1 7408                    	jz	short frcd25 ; = 0
 37706                                  frcd24:		; 03/03/2024

 37711                                  	;;;
 37712                                  	;mov	[es:di+4Bh],ax
 37713 000065A7 2689454B                	mov	[es:di+curdir.ID+2],ax ; -1
 37714                                  	;;;
 37715                                  frcd25:	
 37716                                  	;;add	di,81  ; MSDOS 3.3
 37717                                  	;add	di,88  ; MSDOS 6.0	 
 37718 000065AB 83C758                  	ADD	DI,curdir.size		; Point to next CDS
 37719 000065AE E2D2                    	LOOP	frcd20
 37720 000065B0 1F                      	POP	DS
 37721                                  NO_CHANGE:

 37723 000065B5 F8                      	CLC
 37724 000065B6 C3                      	retn
 37725                                  
 37726                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 37727                                  ; 05/01/2024 - Retro DOS 5.0
 37728                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0A7Fh
 37729                                  ;;;
 37730                                  chk_set_first_access:
 37731                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+0Fh],0
 37732 000065B7 26837E0F00              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE],0
 37733 000065BC 750D                    	jnz	short chk_set_fa_1	; FAT (FAT12 or FAT16)
 37734                                  	; FAT32
 37735                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh
 37736 000065BE 26837E21FF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW],0FFFFh ; -1
 37737                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+21h],0FFFFh	; High word of free cluster count
 37738 000065C3 26C74621FFFF            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT_HW],0FFFFh ; -1
 37739 000065C9 7505                    	jne	short chk_set_fa_2
 37740                                  chk_set_fa_1:
 37741                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh
 37742 000065CB 26837E1FFF              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 37743                                  chk_set_fa_2:
 37744                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Fh],0FFFFh	; Count of free clusters, -1 if unknown
 37745 000065D0 26C7461FFFFF            	mov	word [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],0FFFFh ; -1
 37746 000065D6 7405                    	je	short chk_set_fa_3
 37747                                  	;or	byte [es:bp+18h],1
 37748 000065D8 26804E1801              	or	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],1
 37749                                  chk_set_fa_3:
 37750 000065DD C3                      	retn
 37751                                  ;;;

 37755                                  ;Break	<Fat_Operation - miscellaneous fat stuff>
 37756                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37757                                  ;
 37758                                  ; Procedure Name : FAT_operation
 37759                                  ;
 37760                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37761                                  
 37762                                  	; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 37763                                  
 37764                                  	; 04/03/2024
 37765                                  	; 03/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37766                                  
 37767                                  FAT_operation:
 37768                                  	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 37769                                  FATERR:
 37770                                  
 37771                                  ; 03/03/2024
 37772                                  %if 0
 37773                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Eh],-1
 37774                                  	;mov	word [es:bp+1Fh],-1 ; MSDOS 6.0
 37775                                  	MOV	word [ES:BP+DPB.FREE_CNT],-1 
 37776                                  					; Err in FAT must force recomp of freespace
 37777                                  %else
 37778                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37779                                  	;;;
 37780 000065DE E8D6FF                  	call    chk_set_first_access
 37781                                  	;;;
 37782                                  %endif
 37783                                  	;and	di,0FFh
 37784 000065E1 81E7FF00                	AND	DI,STECODE		; Put error code in DI
 37785                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 37786 000065E5 C606[4B03]18            	MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 37787                                  	;mov	ah,1Ah
 37788 000065EA B41A                    	MOV	AH,2+Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; While trying to read FAT
 37789 000065EC A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]		; Tell which drive
 37790 000065EF E8F2FA                  	call	FATAL1
 37791 000065F2 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 37792 000065F6 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3
 37793 000065F8 7502                    	JNZ	short FAT_GOT_DPB	; User said retry
 37794                                  
 37795                                  FATERR_fail:	; 03/03/2024
 37796 000065FA F9                      	STC				; User said FAIL
 37797 000065FB C3                      	retn
 37798                                  
 37799                                  FAT_GOT_DPB:
 37800                                  	;Context DS			;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37801 000065FC 16                      	push	ss
 37802 000065FD 1F                      	pop	ds
 37803                                  
 37804                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37805                                  	;;;
 37806 000065FE 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37807 00006600 09E8                    	or	ax,bp
 37808 00006602 74F6                    	jz	short FATERR_fail
 37809                                  	;;;
 37810                                  
 37811                                  	;;mov	al,0Fh
 37812                                  	;MOV	AL,DMEDHL
 37813                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37814                                  	;;;
 37815 00006604 B013                    	mov	al,19
 37816                                  	;;;
 37817                                  
 37818                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+1]
 37819 00006606 268A6601                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 37820 0000660A A3[5A03]                	MOV	[DEVCALL_REQLEN],AX ; 09/09/2018 
 37821 0000660D C606[5C03]01            	MOV	BYTE [DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVMDCH
 37822 00006612 C706[5D03]0000          	MOV	word [DEVCALL_REQSTAT],0
 37823                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+16h]
 37824                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+17h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37825 00006618 268A4617                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 37826 0000661C A2[6703]                	MOV	[CALLMED],AL
 37827 0000661F 06                      	PUSH	ES
 37828 00006620 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 37829                                  
 37830                                  ;hkn; DEVCALL is in DOSDATA
 37831 00006621 BB[5A03]                	MOV	BX,DEVCALL
 37832                                  	;;lds	si,[es:bp+12h]
 37833                                  	;lds	si,[es:bp+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37834 00006624 26C57613                	LDS	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; DS:SI Points to device header
 37835 00006628 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:BX Points to call header
 37836 00006629 E86EEC                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 37837                                  	;Context DS		 	;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 37838 0000662C 16                      	push	ss
 37839 0000662D 1F                      	pop	ds
 37840 0000662E 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 37841 0000662F 8B3E[5D03]              	MOV	DI,[DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 37842                                  	;test	di,8000h
 37843                                  	;jnz	short FATERR
 37844 00006633 09FF                    	or	di,di
 37845 00006635 78A7                    	js	short FATERR		; have error
 37846                                  
 37847                                  ; 03/03/2024
 37848                                  %if 0
 37849                                  	XOR	AH,AH
 37850                                  	;xchg	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 37851                                  	;xchg	ah,[es:bp+18h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37852                                  	XCHG	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS] ; Reset dpb_first_access
 37853                                  %else
 37854                                  	; 03/03/2024 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 37855                                  	;;;
 37856                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+18h]
 37857 00006637 268A6618                	mov	ah,[es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS]
 37858 0000663B 80E480                  	and	ah,80h		; izolate (FAT) first access bit
 37859                                  	;and	byte [es:bp+18h],7Fh
 37860 0000663E 268066187F              	and	byte [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_ACCESS],7Fh
 37861                                  				; clear first access (FAT) bit 7
 37862                                  	;;; 
 37863                                  %endif
 37864                                  
 37865 00006643 A0[7605]                	MOV	AL,[THISDRV]		; Use physical unit number
 37866                                  ; See if we had changed volume id by creating one on the diskette
 37867 00006646 3806[A10A]              	cmp	[VOLCHNG_FLAG],AL
 37868 0000664A 7508                    	jnz	short CHECK_BYT
 37869 0000664C C606[A10A]FF            	mov	byte [VOLCHNG_FLAG],-1 ; 0FFh
 37870 00006651 E9B000                  	jmp	GOGETBPB		; Need to get device driver to read in
 37871                                  					; new volume label.
 37872                                  CHECK_BYT:
 37873 00006654 0A26[6803]              	OR	AH,[CALLRBYT]
 37874                                  	;JNS	short CHECK_ZR		; ns = 0 or 1
 37875                                  	;JMP	short NEWDSK
 37876                                  	; 17/12/2022
 37877 00006658 785E                    	js	short NEWDSK
 37878                                  	; 27/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 37879                                  	;JNS	short CHECK_ZR		; ns = 0 or 1
 37880                                  	;JMP	short NEWDSK
 37881                                  
 37882                                  CHECK_ZR:
 37883 0000665A 743B                    	JZ	short CHKBUFFDIRT	; jump if I don't know
 37884                                  	; 24/09/2023
 37885                                  	; cf=0 (after 'or' instruction)
 37886                                  	;CLC
 37887 0000665C C3                      	retn				; If Media not changed (NZ)
 37888                                  
 37889                                  DISK_CHNG_ERR:
 37890 0000665D 06                      	PUSH	ES
 37891 0000665E 55                      	PUSH	BP
 37892                                  	;;les	bp,[es:bp+12h]
 37893                                  	;les	bp,[es:bp+13h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 37894 0000665F 26C46E13                	LES	BP,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; Get device pointer

 38320 0000683C 268B4E2D                	mov	cx,[es:bp+DPB.LAST_CLUSTER]
 38321                                  
 38322                                  	;mov	ax,[di+488]		; FSI_FreeCount ; bx:cx = number of clusters + 1
 38323 00006840 8B85E801                	mov	ax,[di+FSINFO.Free_Count]
 38324                                  	;mov	dx,[di+490]		; FSI_FreeCount+2
 38325 00006844 8B95EA01                	mov	dx,[di+FSINFO.Free_Count+2]
 38326                                  
 38327 00006848 39DA                    	cmp	dx,bx			; is Free Count >= (Number of Clusters + 1) ?
 38328 0000684A 7502                    	jne	short gotgetbuf7	; if yes, it is invalid value (must be 0FFFFFFFFh)
 38329 0000684C 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38330                                  gotgetbuf7:
 38331 0000684E 7308                    	jnb	short gotgetbuf8	; yes, invalid value (must be 0FFFFFFFFh)
 38332                                  	
 38333                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Fh],ax		; no,valid free count
 38334 00006850 2689461F                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT],ax ; save free count into [es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT]
 38335                                  	;mov	[es:bp+21h],dx
 38336 00006854 26895621                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FREE_CNT+2],dx
 38337                                  
 38338                                  gotgetbuf8:
 38339                                  	;mov	ax,[di+492]		; FSI_Nxt_Free
 38340 00006858 8B85EC01                	mov	ax,[di+FSINFO.Nxt_Free]
 38341                                  	;mov	dx,[di+494]
 38342 0000685C 8B95EE01                	mov	dx,[di+FSINFO.Nxt_Free+2]
 38343                                  
 38344 00006860 39DA                    	cmp	dx,bx			; is the next free clust num >= (num of clusters + 1) ?
 38345 00006862 7502                    	jne	short gotgetbuf9	; invalid (if dx > bx)
 38346 00006864 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38347                                  gotgetbuf9:
 38348 00006866 730C                    	jnb	short gotgetbuf10 ; invalid
 38349                                  
 38350                                  	;mov	[es:bp+39h],ax		; save next free (search) cluster number
 38351 00006868 26894639                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE],ax ; into [es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE]
 38352                                  	;mov	[es:bp+3Bh],dx
 38353 0000686C 2689563B                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_NXTFREE+2],dx
 38354                                  	;mov	[es:bp+1Dh],ax		; and into [es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE] ; low word
 38355 00006870 2689461D                	mov	[es:bp+DPB.NEXT_FREE],ax
 38356                                  
 38357                                  gotgetbuf10:
 38358 00006874 59                      	pop	cx
 38359 00006875 5B                      	pop	bx
 38360 00006876 5A                      	pop	dx
 38361                                  
 38362                                  gotgetbuf11:
 38363 00006877 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0	; is buffer in HMA ?
 38364                                  	;jnz	short gotgetbuf12	; yes
 38365 0000687D 753A                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf16 ; 04/03/2024
 38366

 38368                                  	; 04/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0
 38369 0000687F EB0F                    	jmp	short gotgetbuf17
 38370                                  
 38371                                  gotgetbuf12:
 38372 00006881 36803E[7900]00          	cmp	byte [ss:BuffInHMA],0
 38373 00006887 7530                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf16
 38374                                  
 38375                                  	;cmp	word [es:bp+6],1
 38376 00006889 26837E0601              	cmp	word [es:bp+DPB.FIRST_FAT],1 ; 1st FAT start sector
 38377 0000688E 7405                    	jz	short gotgetbuf13
 38378                                  
 38379                                  gotgetbuf17:	; 04/03/2024
 38380                                  	;mov	word [di-20],0FFh	; invalidate buffer (set it as free buffer)
 38381                                  			  		; di = buffer header + 4 (BUFINFO.buf_ID)
 38382 00006890 C745ECFF00              	mov	word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID-BUFINSIZ],0FFh
 38383                                  
 38384                                  gotgetbuf13:
 38385                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+8]
 38386 00006895 268A4608                	mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 38387                                  	;mov	[di-14],al		; buffer header address + 10
 38388 00006899 8845F2                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcnt-BUFINSIZ],al
 38389                                  
 38390                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 38391 0000689C 268B460F                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT_SIZE]	; 16 bit FAT size field
 38392 000068A0 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 38393 000068A2 750D                    	jnz	short gotgetbuf14 ; FAT (FAT12 or FAT16) fs
 38394                                  	
 38395                                  	; FAT32 fs
 38396                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+31h]		; FAT sectors (per one FAT)
 38397 000068A4 268B4631                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_SIZE] 
 38398                                  	;mov	[di-13],ax 	; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc ; # sectors between each write
 38399 000068A8 8945F3                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38400                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+33h]
 38401 000068AB 268B4633                	mov	ax,[es:bp+DPB.FAT32_SIZE+2]
 38402 000068AF EB05                    	jmp	short gotgetbuf15
 38403                                  
 38404                                  gotgetbuf14:
 38405                                  	;mov	[di-13],ax		; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc
 38406 000068B1 8945F3                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38407                                  
 38408                                  	;xor	ax,ax			; 0
 38409 000068B4 29C0                    	sub	ax,ax ; 0
 38410                                  
 38411                                  gotgetbuf15:
 38412                                  	;;mov	[di-15],ax		; BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc+2 ; hw of sectors per FAT

 38414                                  					; Erdogan Tan - 03/03/2024
 38415                                  	;mov	[di-11],ax
 38416 000068B6 8945F5                  	mov	[di+BUFFINFO.buf_wrtcntinc+2-BUFINSIZ],ax
 38417                                  
 38418                                  gotgetbuf16:

 38420                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 38421 000068B9 16                      	push	ss
 38422 000068BA 1F                      	pop	ds
 38423                                  	;xor	al,al			; Media changed (Z),Carry clear
 38424 000068BB 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 38425 000068BD C3                      	retn

 38463                                  ;SETVISIT:
 38464                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38465                                  ;	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5CAFh
 38466                                  ;; Inputs:
 38467                                  ;;      None
 38468                                  ;; Function:
 38469                                  ;;      Set up a scan of I/O buffers
 38470                                  ;; Outputs:
 38471                                  ;;      All visit flags = 0
 38472                                  ;;              NOTE: This pre-scan is needed because a hard disk error
 38473                                  ;;                    may cause a scan to stop in the middle leaving some
 38474                                  ;;                    visit flags set, and some not set.
 38475                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to [BUFFHEAD]
 38476                                  ;; No other registers altered
 38477                                  ;
 38478                                  ;       LDS     DI,[SS:BUFFHEAD] ; 15/03/2018
 38479                                  ;	PUSH    AX
 38480                                  ;       ;;XOR	AX,AX	  ;; MSDOS 2.11
 38481                                  ;	;mov	al,0DFh
 38482                                  ;	mov	al,~buf_visit
 38483                                  ;SETLOOP:
 38484                                  ;       ;;MOV	[DI+7],AL ;; MSDOS 2.11
 38485                                  ;	;and	[DI+5],al
 38486                                  ;	AND	[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],AL
 38487                                  ;       LDS     DI,[DI]
 38488                                  ;       CMP     DI,-1
 38489                                  ;       JNZ     SHORT SETLOOP
 38490                                  ;       POP     AX ; 09/09/2018
 38491                                  ;	LDS     DI,[SS:BUFFHEAD] ; 15/03/2018
 38492                                  ;SVISIT_RETN:
 38493                                  ;       RETN
 38494                                  ;
 38495                                  ;SKIPVISIT:
 38496                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 38498                                  ;
 38499                                  ;; Inputs:
 38500                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to a buffer
 38501                                  ;; Function:
 38502                                  ;;      Skip visited buffers
 38503                                  ;; Outputs:
 38504                                  ;;      DS:DI Points to next unvisited buffer
 38505                                  ;;      Zero is set if skip to LAST buffer

 38509                                  ;       ;retz
 38510                                  ;       JZ	SHORT SVISIT_RETN
 38511                                  ;

 38513                                  ;       ;;;retnz
 38514                                  ;       ;;JNZ	SHORT SVISIT_RETN

 38559                                  ;Break	<GETCURHEAD -- Get current buffer header>
 38560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38561                                  ; Procedure Name : GetCurHead
 38562                                  ; Inputs:
 38563                                  ;	 No Inputs
 38564                                  ; Function:
 38565                                  ;	Returns the pointer to the first buffer in Queue
 38566                                  ;	and updates FIRST_BUFF_ADDR
 38567                                  ;       and invalidates LASTBUFFER (recency pointer)
 38568                                  ; Outputs:
 38569                                  ;	DS:DI = pointer to the first buffer in Queue
 38570                                  ;	FIRST_BUFF_ADDR = offset ( DI ) of First buffer in Queue
 38571                                  ;       LASTBUFFER = -1
 38572                                  ; No other registers altered
 38573                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38574                                  
 38575                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38576                                  ; DOSCODE:98D2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 38577                                  ; 27/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 38578                                  ; DOSCODE:9876h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 38579                                  
 38580                                  ; 06/03/2024 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 38581                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM - DOSCODE:0AA4Bh
 38582                                  
 38583                                  GETCURHEAD:
 38584 000068BE 36C53E[6D00]            	lds	di,[ss:BufferQueue]	; Pointer to the first buffer
 38585 000068C3 36C706[1E00]FFFF        	mov	word [ss:LastBuffer],-1	; invalidate last buffer
 38586 000068CA 36893E[7E11]            	mov	[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],di	; save first buffer address
 38587 000068CF C3                      	retn
 38588

 38602                                  ;SCANPLACE:
 38603                                  ;	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 38605                                  ;	push	es
 38606                                  ;	les	si,[di]
 38607                                  ;	;les	si,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_link]
 38608                                  ;	call	PLACEBUF
 38609                                  ;	push	es

 38620 000068D2 E80200                  	call	PLACEBUF

 38651 000068E2 7422                    	je	short nret			;Yes, special case	;AN000;

 38653 000068E6 7506                    	jne	short not_first 		;Yes, special case	;AN000;

 38752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38753                                  ; places buffer at head

 38768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38769                                  ; Procedure Name : PLACEHEAD
 38770                                  ;
 38771                                  ; SAME AS PLACEBUF except places buffer at head
 38772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38773                                  
 38774                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (Retro DOS v3.0)
 38775                                  	; 05/09/2018

 38793                                  ;       MOV	[SS:BUFFHEAD],DI

 38815                                  ;Break	<POINTCOMP -- 20 BIT POINTER COMPARE>
 38816                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38817                                  ;
 38818                                  ; Procedure Name : PointComp
 38819                                  ; Inputs:
 38820                                  ;         DS:SI & ES:DI
 38821                                  ; Function:
 38822                                  ;          Checks for ((SI==DI) && (ES==DS))
 38823                                  ;	   Assumes that pointers are normalized for the
 38824                                  ;	   same segment
 38825                                  ;
 38826                                  ; Compare DS:SI to ES:DI (or DS:DI to ES:SI) for equality
 38827                                  ; DO NOT USE FOR < or >
 38828                                  ; No Registers altered
 38829                                  ;
 38830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38831                                  
 38832                                  POINTCOMP:
 38833                                  	; 31/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38834                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5D84h
 38835 00006914 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 38836 00006916 750A                    	jnz	short _ret_label	; return if nz
 38837                                  	;jnz	short placehead_retn 
 38838 00006918 51                      	PUSH	CX
 38839 00006919 52                      	PUSH	DX
 38840 0000691A 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS
 38841 0000691C 8CC2                    	MOV	DX,ES
 38842 0000691E 39D1                    	CMP	CX,DX
 38843 00006920 5A                      	POP	DX
 38844 00006921 59                      	POP	CX
 38845                                  _ret_label:
 38846 00006922 C3                      	retn
 38847                                  
 38848                                  ; 01/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 38849                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5D93h 
 38850                                  
 38851                                  ;Break	<GETBUFFR, GETBUFFRB -- GET A SECTOR INTO A BUFFER>
 38852                                  
 38853                                  ;**	GetBuffr - Get a non-FAT Sector into a Buffer
 38854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38855                                  ;	GetBuffr does normal ( non-FAT ) sector buffering
 38856                                  ;	It gets the specified local sector into one of the I/O buffers
 38857                                  ;	and shuffles the queue
 38858                                  ; 
 38859                                  ;	ENTRY	(AL) = 0 means sector must be pre-read
 38860                                  ;		       ELSE no pre-read
 38861                                  ;		(DX) = Desired physical sector number	      (LOW)
 38862                                  ;		HIGH_SECTOR = Desired physical sector number (HIGH)
 38863                                  ;		(ES:BP) = Pointer to drive parameters
 38864                                  ;		ALLOWED set in case of INT 24
 38865                                  ;	EXIT	'C' set if error (user FAIL response to INT24)
 38866                                  ;		'C' clear if OK
 38867                                  ;		CURBUF Points to the Buffer for the sector
 38868                                  ;		    the buffer type bits OF buf_flags = 0, caller must set it
 38869                                  ;	USES	AX, BX, CX, SI, DI, Flags
 38870                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38871                                  
 38872                                  ;**	GetBuffrb - Get a FAT Sector into a Buffer
 38873                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38874                                  ;	GetBuffrb reads a sector from the FAT file system's FAT table.
 38875                                  ;	It gets the specified sector into one of the I/O buffers
 38876                                  ;	and shuffles the queue. We need a special entry point so that
 38877                                  ;	we can read the alternate FAT sector if the first read fails, also
 38878                                  ;	so we can mark the buffer as a FAT sector.
 38879                                  ; 
 38880                                  ;	ENTRY	(AL) = 0 means sector must be pre-read
 38881                                  ;		       ELSE no pre-read
 38882                                  ;		(DX) = Desired physical sector number	     (LOW)
 38883                                  ;		(SI) != 0
 38884                                  ;		HIGH_SECTOR = Desired physical sector number (HIGH)
 38885                                  ;		(ES:BP) = Pointer to drive parameters
 38886                                  ;		ALLOWED set in case of INT 24
 38887                                  ;	EXIT	'C' set if error (user FAIL response to INT24)
 38888                                  ;		'C' clear if OK
 38889                                  ;		CUR ddBUF Points to the Buffer for the sector
 38890                                  ;		    the buffer type bits OF buf_flags = 0, caller must set it
 38891                                  ;	USES	AX, BX, CX, SI, DI, Flags
 38892                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38893                                  
 38894                                  	; 22/09/2023 - RetroDOS v4.2 MSDOS.SYS (optimization)

 39881                                  
 39882                                  ; Pseudo EXEC system call for DOS
 39883                                  
 39884                                  ;	TITLE	MSPROC - process maintenance
 39885                                  ;	NAME	MSPROC
 39886                                  
 39887                                  ; =========================================================================
 39888                                  ;**	Process related system calls and low level routines for DOS 2.X.
 39889                                  ;	I/O specs are defined in DISPATCH.
 39890                                  ;
 39891                                  ;	$WAIT
 39892                                  ;	$EXEC
 39893                                  ;	$Keep_process
 39894                                  ;	Stay_resident
 39895                                  ;	$EXIT
 39896                                  ;	$ABORT
 39897                                  ;	abort_inner
 39898                                  ;
 39899                                  ;	Modification history:
 39900                                  ;
 39901                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 39902                                  ;		AN000	version 4.0 jan. 1988
 39903                                  ;		A007	PTM 3957 - fake vesrion for IBMCACHE.COM
 39904                                  ;		A008	PTM 4070 - fake version for MS WINDOWS
 39905                                  ;
 39906                                  ;		M000	added support for loading programs into UMBs 7/9/90
 39907                                  ;
 39908                                  ;		M004 - MS PASCAL 3.2 support. Please see under tag M003 in 
 39909                                  ;		       dossym.inc. 7/30/90
 39910                                  ;		M005 - Support for EXE programs with out STACK segment and 
 39911                                  ;		       with resident size < 64K - 256 bytes. A 256 byte 
 39912                                  ;		       stack is provided at the end of the program. Note that
 39913                                  ;		       only SP is changed.
 39914                                  ;		M020 - Fix for Rational bug for details see exepatch.asm
 39915                                  ;
 39916                                  ;		M028 - 4b04 implementation
 39917                                  ;
 39918                                  ;		M029 - Support for EXEs without stack rewritten. If EXE is
 39919                                  ;			in memory block >= 64K, sp = 0. If memory block
 39920                                  ;			obtained is <64K, point sp at the end of the memory
 39921                                  ;			block. For EXEs smaller than 64K, 256 bytes are still
 39922                                  ;			added for a stack segment which may be needed if it
 39923                                  ;			is loaded in low memory situations.
 39924                                  ;
 39925                                  ;		M030 - Fixing bug in EXEPACPATCH & changing 4b04 to 4b05
 39926                                  ;
 39927                                  ;		M040 - Bug #3052. The environment sizing code would flag a
 39928                                  ;			a bad environment if it reached 32767 bytes. Changed
 39929                                  ;			to allow 32768 bytes of environment.
 39930                                  ;
 39931                                  ;		M047 - Release the allocated UMB when we failed to load a 
 39932                                  ;		       COM file high. Also ensure that if the biggest block
 39933                                  ;		       into which we load the com file is less than 64K then
 39934                                  ;		       we provide atleast 256 bytes of stack to the user.
 39935                                  ;
 39936                                  ;		M050 - Made Lie table search CASE insensitive
 39937                                  ;
 39938                                  ;		M060 - Removed special version table from the kernal and
 39939                                  ;                      put it in a device drive which puts the address
 39940                                  ;                      in the DOS DATA area location UU_IFS_DOS_CALL
 39941                                  ;		       as a DWORD.
 39942                                  ;
 39943                                  ;		M063 - Modified UMB support. If the HIGH_ONLY bit is set on
 39944                                  ;		       entry do not try to load low if there is no space in
 39945                                  ;		       UMBs.
 39946                                  ;
 39947                                  ;		M068 - Support for copy protect apps. Call ChkCopyProt to 
 39948                                  ;		       set a20off_count. Set bit EXECA20BIT in DOS_FLAG. Also
 39949                                  ;		       change return address to LeaveDos if AL=5.
 39950                                  ;
 39951                                  ;               20-Jul-1992 bens  Added ifdef RESTRICTED_BUILD code that
 39952                                  ;                      controls building a version of MSDOS.SYS that only
 39953                                  ;                      runs programs from a fixed list (defined in the
 39954                                  ;                      file RESTRICT.INC).  Search for "RESTRICTED_BUILD"
 39955                                  ;                      for details.  This feature is used to build a
 39956                                  ;                      "special" version of DOS that can be handed out to
 39957                                  ;                      OEM/ISV customers as part of a "service" disk.
 39958                                  ;
 39959                                  ; =========================================================================

 39989                                  _$WAIT:
 39990                                  	; 02/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 39991                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 5E1h
 39992                                  
 39993 00006BE3 31C0                    	xor	AX,AX

 39997                                  ; =========================================================================
 39998                                  ;BREAK <$exec - load/go a program>
 39999                                  ;	EXEC.ASM - EXEC System Call
 40000                                  ;
 40001                                  ;
 40002                                  ; Assembler usage:
 40003                                  ;	    lds     DX, Name
 40004                                  ;	    les     BX, Blk
 40005                                  ;	    mov     AH, Exec
 40006                                  ;	    mov     AL, FUNC
 40007                                  ;	    int     INT_COMMAND
 40008                                  ;
 40009                                  ;	AL  Function
 40010                                  ;	--  --------
 40011                                  ;	 0  Load and execute the program.
 40012                                  ;	 1  Load, create the program header but do not
 40013                                  ;	    begin execution.
 40014                                  ;	 3  Load overlay. No header created.
 40015                                  ;
 40016                                  ;	    AL = 0 -> load/execute program
 40017                                  ;
 40018                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40019                                  ;	    | WORD segment address of	|
 40020                                  ;	    | environment.		|
 40021                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40022                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to ASCIZ	|
 40023                                  ;	    | command line at 80h	|
 40024                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40025                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to default	|
 40026                                  ;	    | FCB to be passed at 5Ch	|
 40027                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40028                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to default	|
 40029                                  ;	    | FCB to be passed at 6Ch	|
 40030                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40031                                  ;
 40032                                  ;	    AL = 1 -> load program
 40033                                  ;
 40034                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40035                                  ;	    | WORD segment address of	|
 40036                                  ;	    | environment.		|
 40037                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40038                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to ASCIZ	|
 40039                                  ;	    | command line at 80h	|
 40040                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40041                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to default	|
 40042                                  ;	    | FCB to be passed at 5Ch	|
 40043                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40044                                  ;	    | DWORD pointer to default	|
 40045                                  ;	    | FCB to be passed at 6Ch	|
 40046                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40047                                  ;	    | DWORD returned value of	|
 40048                                  ;	    | CS:IP			|
 40049                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40050                                  ;	    | DWORD returned value of	|
 40051                                  ;	    | SS:IP			|
 40052                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40053                                  ;
 40054                                  ;	    AL = 3 -> load overlay
 40055                                  ;
 40056                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40057                                  ;	    | WORD segment address where|
 40058                                  ;	    | file will be loaded.	|
 40059                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40060                                  ;	    | WORD relocation factor to |
 40061                                  ;	    | be applied to the image.	|
 40062                                  ;	    +---------------------------+
 40063                                  ;
 40064                                  ; Returns:
 40065                                  ;	    AX = error_invalid_function
 40066                                  ;	       = error_bad_format
 40067                                  ;	       = error_bad_environment
 40068                                  ;	       = error_not_enough_memory
 40069                                  ;	       = error_file_not_found
 40070                                  ; =========================================================================
 40071                                  ;
 40072                                  ;   Revision history:
 40073                                  ;
 40074                                  ;	 A000	version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 40075                                  ;
 40076                                  ; =========================================================================
 40077
